knob.name: QuietBoot
knob.description: [Enabled] - Display the logo screen during POST. [Disabled] - Display the diagnostic screen during POST.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Main/Quiet Boot

knob.name: PfrLock
knob.description: Disable/Enable PFR Lock. When locked, PFR cannot be unlocked unless CPLD is reprogrammed. Selectable only if PFR is (provisioned AND not locked).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PfrSupported _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( PfrLockStatus _EQU_ 1 OR PfrProvisionStatus _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Main/PFR/PFR Lock

knob.name: PfrProvision
knob.description: Disable/Enable PFR Provision. Enable to perform PFR Provision. Selectable only if PFR is (not provisioned AND not locked).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PfrSupported _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( PfrLockStatus _EQU_ 1 OR PfrProvisionStatus _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Main/PFR/PFR Provision

knob.name: PfrUnProvision
knob.description: Disable/Enable PFR UnProvision. Enable to Erase PFR Provision Information. Selectable only if PFR is (provisioned AND not locked).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PfrSupported _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( PfrLockStatus _EQU_ 1 OR PfrProvisionStatus _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Main/PFR/PFR UnProvision

knob.name: OnboardNICEnable_0
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard Network Controller.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR ( BootMode _EQU_ 0 AND PCHNIC _EQU_ 1 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/NIC1 Controller

knob.name: OnboardNICEnable_1
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard Network Controller.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/NIC2 Controller

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_4
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?1?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_4 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/NIC2 Port1

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_5
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?2?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_5 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/NIC2 Port2

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_6
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?3?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_6 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/NIC2 Port3

knob.name: OnboardNICPortEnable_7
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard NIC?2? Port?4?.
knob.depex: Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICHidden_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICEnable_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_7 _EQU_ 1 OR NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/NIC2 Port4

knob.name: IB1_PXE
knob.description: Enable/Disable InfiniBand Controller Option ROM and FlexBoot
knob.depex: Sif( NIC2_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/NIC2 InfiniBand Option ROM

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_8
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_8 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/IOM1 Port1 PXE

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_9
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_9 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/IOM1 Port2 PXE

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_10
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_10 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/IOM1 Port3 PXE

knob.name: OnboardNICIOMPortPXEEnable_11
knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_2 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_11 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/IOM1 Port4 PXE

knob.depex: Sif( NIC3_InfiniBand_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/IOM1 InfiniBand Option ROM

knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/NIC Configuration/IOM2 Port1 PXE

knob.description: Enable/Disable Onboard/IOM NIC Port PXE Boot
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardNICHidden_3 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( FCoEEnabled _EQU_ 1 AND FCoE_Hidden _EQU_ 0 AND NIC10GbeCapbility_3 _EQU_ 1 ) OR ( OnBNICiSCSI _EQU_ 1 AND iSCSI10Gb_Hidden _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Gif( ( NIC10GbeCapbility_3 _EQU_ 1 AND PXE10GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( NIC10GbeCapbility_3 _EQU_ 0 AND PXE1GEnabled _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( OnboardNICPortHidden_13 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: Pci64BitResourceAllocation
knob.description: Enable or disable memory mapped I/O of 64-bit PCI devices to 4 GB or greater address space.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/Memory Mapped I/O above 4 GB

knob.name: MmiohBase
knob.description: Select MMIO High Base
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar4_Pci64BitResourceAllocation _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/MMIO High Base

knob.name: MmiohSize
knob.description: Sets the Size of MMIO space above 4GB.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar4_Pci64BitResourceAllocation _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/Memory Mapped I/O Size

knob.name: AddinVideoAdapter
knob.description: When Onboard Video is Enabled, and Add-in Video Adapter is also Enabled, both can be active. The onboard video is still the primary console and active during BIOS POST; the add-in video adapter would be active under an OS environment with the video driver support. When Onboard Video is Enabled, and Add-in Video Adapter is Disabled, then only the onboard video would be active. When Onboard Video is Disabled, and Add-in Video Adapter is Enabled, then only the add-in video adapter would be active.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x01 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x02 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x01 AND VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x04 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x01 AND VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x05 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/Add-in Video Adapter

knob.name: OnboardVideo
knob.description: Enable or disable onboard video controller. Warning: System video is completely disabled if this option is disabled and an add-in video adapter is not installed.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x01 OR LegacyVgaSocket _EQU_ 0x02 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/Onboard Video

knob.name: FastVideo
knob.description: Enable/disable fast video. Fast video allows the screen light up in early phase. Note:Fast Video only appears when Onboard Video is Enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( OnboardVideo _EQU_ 0x02 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/Fast Video

knob.name: LegacyVgaSocket
knob.description: Determines whether Legacy VGA video output is enabled for PCIe slots attached to Processor Socket 0 or 1. Socket 0 is the default.
knob.depex: Sif( LegacyVgaSocket_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x01 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x02 OR VideoExistFlag _EQU_ 0x03 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/Legacy VGA Socket

knob.name: ARIEnable
knob.description: Enable or disable the ARI support.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/ARI Support

knob.name: SRIOVEnable
knob.description: Enable or disable the SR-IOV support.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/SR-IOV Support

knob.name: UEFINetworkStack
knob.description: Enable or Disable the whole UEFI Network Stack.
knob.depex: Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/UEFI Network Stack/UEFI Network Stack

knob.name: IPv4PXESupport
knob.description: Enable or Disable IPv4 PXE Support in the UEFI Network Stack.
knob.depex: Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UEFINetworkStack _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/UEFI Network Stack/IPv4 PXE Support

knob.name: IPv6PXESupport
knob.description: Enable or Disable IPv6 PXE Support in the UEFI Network Stack.
knob.depex: Sif( BootMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( UEFINetworkStack _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/PCI Configuration/UEFI Network Stack/IPv6 PXE Support

knob.name: SerialA
knob.description: Enable or Disable Serial port A.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Serial Port Configuration/Serial A Enable

knob.name: SerialAIo
knob.description: Select Serial port A base I/O address.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialA _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Serial Port Configuration/Serial A Address

knob.name: SerialB
knob.description: Enable or Disable Serial port B.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialB_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Serial Port Configuration/Serial B Enable

knob.name: SerialBIo
knob.description: Select Serial port B base I/O address. This field will not appear when Serial B port enable/disable does not appear.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialB_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SerialB _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Serial Port Configuration/Serial B Address

knob.name: QpiLinkSpeed
knob.description: Allows for selecting the Intel(R) UltraPath Interconnect Frequency. Recommended to leave in [Auto Max] so that the BIOS can select the highest common Intel(R) UltraPath Interconnect frequency.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_NumCpus _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/UPI Configuration/Intel(R) UPI Frequency Select

knob.name: XptPrefetchEn
knob.description: XPT Prefetch.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar16_HbmSku _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/UPI Configuration/XPT Prefetch

knob.name: DfxHitMeEn
knob.description: CHA HitME Cache Enable
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/UPI Configuration/Hit Me

knob.name: IoDcMode
knob.description: IO Directory Cache (IODC): generate snoops instead of memory lookups, for remote InvItoM (IIO) and/or WCiLF (cores), Auto - Auto sets to WCiLF.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/UPI Configuration/IO Directory Cache (IODC)

option.text: Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid Push
Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid AllocNonAlloc
Enable for Remote InvItoM and Remote WCiLF

knob.name: KtiPrefetchEn
knob.description: KTI Prefetch.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/UPI Configuration/KTI Prefetch

knob.name: StaleAtoSOptEn
knob.description: Stale A to S Dir optimization.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/UPI Configuration/Stale AtoS

knob.name: LLCDeadLineAlloc
knob.description: Enable - opportunistically fill dead lines in LLC. Disable - never fill dead lines in LLC.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/UPI Configuration/LLC Dead Line Alloc

knob.name: VTdSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel(R) Virtualization Technology for Directed I/O (Intel(R) VT-d). Report the I/O device assignment to VMM through DMAR ACPI Tables.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Intel(R) VT for Directed I/O

knob.name: AcsControl
knob.description: Enable: Programs ACS only to Chipset Pcie Root Ports Bridges; Disable: Programs ACS to all Pcie bridges.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar1_VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/ACS Control

knob.name: DmaCtrlOptIn
knob.description: Enable/Disable DMA_CTRL_PLATFORM_OPT_IN_FLAG in DMAR table in ACPI. Not compatible with Direct Device Assignment (DDA).
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/DMA Control Opt-In Flag

knob.name: CoherencySupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel(R) VT-d Coherency support.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( Nvar17_CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar1_VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Coherency Support

knob.name: ATS
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel (R) VT-d Address Translation Services (ATS) support.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( Nvar17_CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/ATS Support

knob.name: PciePllSsc
knob.description: Pcie Pll SSC percentage or Disable SSC. Range is 0.0%-1.9%. Last one is the POR for LBG.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Pcie Pll SSC

knob.name: Cpu1DMIPcieMaxPayload
knob.description: Set Maxpayload size to 256B if possible
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/DMI-PCIe Port MPSWorkaround

knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Volume Management Device/PCIe SSD1 (CPU0 Port 3D)

knob.name: VmdEnable_0
knob.prompt: SATA/PCIe M.2 Volume Management Device (CPU0 PCH)
knob.description: [Manual] - All specified VMD ports can be selected to enable or disable alone. [Enabled] - All specified VMD ports are forced to enable. [Disabled] - All specified VMD ports are forced to disable.
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( Nvar17_CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) ) _AND_ Sif( M2_1 _EQU_ 0x0 AND M2_2 _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Volume Management Device/SATA/PCIe M.2 Volume Management Device (CPU0 PCH)

knob.name: VmdPchPortEnable_0
knob.description: Configuretion PCH root port: Enable - VMD ownership root port
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( Nvar17_CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) ) _AND_ Sif( M2_1 _EQU_ 0x0 AND M2_2 _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VmdEnable_0 _NEQ_ 0x02 ) _AND_ Sif( M2_1 _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Volume Management Device/M.2 x4 PCIE/SSATA_1

knob.name: VmdPchPortEnable_1
knob.description: Configuretion PCH root port: Enable - VMD ownership root port
knob.depex: Sif( IIOFormSet_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( Nvar17_CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) ) _AND_ Sif( M2_1 _EQU_ 0x0 AND M2_2 _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VmdEnable_0 _NEQ_ 0x02 ) _AND_ Sif( M2_2 _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Integrated IO Configuration/Volume Management Device/M.2 x4 PCIE/SSATA_2

knob.name: DdrFreqLimit
knob.description: Force specific Memory Operating Speed or use Auto setting.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory Operating Speed Selection

knob.name: PagePolicy
knob.description: Select Page Policy.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Page Policy

knob.name: EnforcePopulationPor
knob.description: Enable Memory Population POR Enforcement. Selecting Enforce Validated Populations will only allow populations that have been validated.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar4_EnforcePOR _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Enforce Population POR

knob.name: volMemMode
knob.description: Selects whether 1LM or 2LM memory mode.If 2LM Volatile Memory Mode, BIOS will try to configure 2LM but if BIOS is unable to configure 2LM, volatile memory mode will fall back to 1LM. 1LM+2LM will enable the ?DDR Cache? option. When the 1LM + 2LM option is selected, the UEFI FW will use the DDR Cache Size option to determine the DDR Cache Size for each populated channel. Any remaining DDR will be mapped as 1LM memory.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Volatile Memory Mode

knob.name: NgnArsPublish
knob.description: Enable\Disable publishing of the Address Range Scrub capability to the OS
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Publish ARS capability

knob.name: smbSpeed
knob.description: Sets DDR4 SMBus Clock Frequencies For SPD Access. Current default is 700Khz. Note: If Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem is present, SMBus Clock Frequency is restricted to 400Khz regardless of this setting.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/SMB Clock Frequency

knob.name: AttemptFastBoot
knob.description: Enable - Portions of memory reference code will be skipped when possible to increase boot speed on warm boots. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Attempt Fast Boot

knob.name: AttemptFastBootCold
knob.description: Enable - Portions of memory reference code will be skipped when possible to increase boot speed on cold boots. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Attempt Fast Cold Boot

knob.name: NvmdimmPowerCyclePolicy
knob.description: Enable/Disable power cycle policy when PMem receive surprise clock stop
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Enable Power Cycle Policy

knob.name: ADREn
knob.description: Enables the detecting and enabling of ADR.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 AND ADModePresent _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Enable ADR

knob.name: eraseArmNVDIMMS
knob.description: Enables/Disables Erasing and Arming NVDIMMs.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Erase-Arm NVDIMMs

knob.name: restoreNVDIMMS
knob.description: Enables/Disables Automatic restoring of NVDIMMs.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Restore NVDIMMs

knob.name: interNVDIMMS
knob.description: Controls if NVDIMMs are interleaved together or not.
knob.depex: Sif( NVMPresent _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Interleave NVDIMMs

knob.name: haltOnMemErr
knob.description: Halt on mem Training Error Disable/Enable
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Halt on mem Training Error

knob.name: MirrorMode
knob.description: Allows the user to select the Mirror Mode to be applied for the next boot.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MirrorModeSupport _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar1_RankSparing _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 AND Nvar1_EnableSgx _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Mirror mode

knob.name: ADDDCEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Adaptive Double Device Data Correction Sparing.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( X8DIMMPresent _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _EQU_ 2 OR Nvar1_RankSparing _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 AND Nvar1_EnableSgx _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/ADDDC Sparing

knob.name: RankSparing
knob.description: Enable/Disable Memory Rank Sparing.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR SpareModeSupport _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Memory Sparing

knob.name: multiSparingRanks
knob.description: The Rank number used when Rank Sparing is enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR SpareModeSupport _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR Nvar1_RankSparing _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Multi-Rank Sparing

knob.name: EPSDRASMode
knob.description: Allows the user to select the memory RAS Configuration to be applied for the next boot.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SklMemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Select Memory RAS Configuration

knob.name: Nvar4_multiSparingRanks
knob.description: The Rank number used when Rank Sparing is enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SklMemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR EPSDRASMode _NEQ_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Multi-Rank Sparing

knob.name: NumaEn
knob.description: If enabled, BIOS includes ACPI tables that are required for NUMA-aware Operating Systems.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NumaCap _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( SgxEnable _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/NUMA Optimized

knob.name: SncEn
knob.description: SNC disable will support 1-cluster (XPT/KTI Prefetch enable) 4-IMC way interleave. SNC2 Enable supports 2-clusters SNC and 2-way IMC interleave. Enable SNC2 will gray out UmaBasedClustering knob
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( NumaCap _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar4_NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR ImcEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/SNC (Sub NUMA)

knob.name: UmaBasedClustering
knob.description: UMA Based Clustering options include Disable (ALL2ALL), Hemisphere (2 cluster), and Quadrant (4 cluster, not supported on ICX). These option are only valid when SNC is disabled. If SNC is enabled, UMA-Based Clustering is automatically disabled by BIOS.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SncEn _NEQ_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/UMA-Based Clustering

knob.name: PatrolScrub
knob.description: When enabled, performs periodic checks on memory cells and proactively walks through populated memory space, to seek and correct soft ECC errors.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Patrol Scrub

knob.name: spareErrTh
knob.description: Threshold value for logging Correctable Errors(CE) - Threshold of 10(default) logs 10th CE,?All? logs every CE, and ?None? means no CE logging. All and None are not valid with Rank Sparing.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( EPSDRASMode _EQU_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Correctable Error Threshold

knob.name: CorrMemErrEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Memory Corrected Error.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( MemRas_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Memory Corrected Error

knob.name: MemErrEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Memory Error.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Memory Error

knob.name: CorrMemErrCmciEn
knob.description: If disabled, CMCI event appears when CE happens. If enabled, CMCI event is blocked when CE happens.
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Cloaking

knob.name: PclsEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCLS Sparing
knob.depex: Sif( MemRasForm_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS and Performance Configuration/Partial Cache Line Sparing PCLS

knob.name: AEPErrorInjEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable PMem Error Injection
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/PMem Error Injection

knob.name: LatchSystemShutdownState
knob.description: Latch System Shutdown State
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/PMem Latch System Shutdown State

knob.name: EliminateDirectoryInFarMemory
knob.description: enables new 2LM specific feature to avoid directory updates to far-memory from non-NUMA optimized workloads
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/Snoopy mode for 2LM

knob.name: DisableDirForAppDirect
knob.description: Enables new AD specific feature to avoid directory updates to PMem memory from non-NUMA optimized workloads
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/Snoopy mode for AD

knob.name: NvmdimmPerfConfig
knob.description: PMem baseline performance settings depending on the workload behavior
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/PMem Performance Setting

knob.name: NvmQos
knob.description: Prevents DDR4 BW drop in presence of concurrent DDRT BW
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AEPDimmPresent _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/PMem QoS

option.text: Profile 1 - Optimized for 8 PMem modules per socket
Profile 2 - Optimized for 4/2/1 PMem modules per socket

knob.name: FactoryResetClear
knob.description: Enable\Disable Factory Reset/Clear
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/PMem Factory Reset/Clear

knob.name: FastGoConfig
knob.description: Select PMem QoS Configuration Profiles
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Memory Configuration/Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem BIOS Setting/PMem FastGo Configuration

knob.name: SystemErrorEn
knob.description: System Error Enable/Disable setup options.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/System Errors

knob.name: PoisonEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable System Poison.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SystemErrorEn _EQU_ 0x00 OR SystemErrorEn _EQU_ 0x02 ) _AND_ Gif( SgxEnable _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/System Poison

knob.name: ViralEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Viral.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SystemErrorEn _EQU_ 0x00 OR SystemErrorEn _EQU_ 0x02 OR _LIST_ Nvar17_SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 OR PoisonEn _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/Viral Status

knob.name: IioErrorEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable IIO/PCH Error Support.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SystemErrorEn _EQU_ 0x00 OR SystemErrorEn _EQU_ 0x02 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/IIO/PCH Global Error Support

knob.name: WheaSupport
knob.description: [Enabled] - WHEA (Windows Hardware Error Architecture) is enabled. [Disabled] - WHEA is disabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/WHEA Support

knob.name: ShutdownPolicySelect
knob.description: Allows to configure Shutdown Policy Select in General Interrupt Register. Available modes are INIT and PLTRST.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/IERR Shutdown Policy

knob.name: IioErrRegistersClearEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Clear IIO Error Registers
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( IioErrorEn _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/IIO Error Registers Clear

knob.name: PCIECorrErrorEn
knob.description: [Enabled] - Processor n PCH PCIe correctable error logging is enabled. [Disabled] - Processor n PCH PCIe correctable error logging is disabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/PCIE Correctable Errors

knob.name: PcieCeErrThreshold
knob.description: Threshold value for logging Correctable Errors(CE) - Threshold of 20/10/5 logs 20th/10th/5th CE, ?0? logs every CE.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/PCIE Correctable Error Threshold

knob.name: PropagateSerr
knob.description: On SERR, generate an NMI and log an error. Note: [Enabled] must be selected for the Assert NMI on PERR setup option to be visible.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/Assert NMI on SERR

knob.name: PropagatePerr
knob.description: On PERR, generate an NMI and log an error. Note: This option is only active if the Assert NMI on SERR option has [Enabled] selected.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( PropagateSerr _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/System Event Log/Assert NMI on PERR

knob.name: ProcessorPowerPolicy
knob.description: Allows the user to set an overall power and performance policy for the system, and when changed will modify a selected list of options to achieve the policy. These options are still changeable outside of the policy but do reflect the changes that the policy makes when a new policy is selected. [Performance] Optimization is strongly toward performance, even at the expense of energy efficiency. [Balanced Performance] Weights optimization toward performance, while conserving energy. [Balanced Power] Weights optimization toward energy conservation, with good performance. [Power] Optimization is strongly toward energy efficiency, even at the expense of performance.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU Power and Performance Policy

knob.name: WorkLdConfig
knob.description: Controls the aggressiveness of the energy performance BIAS settings. This bit field allows BIOS to choose a configuration that may improve performance on certain workloads.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar4_ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Workload Configuration

knob.name: PerfPLimitEn
knob.description: Allows the Uncore frequency coordination of two processors when enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( UncorePowerMgt_Hidden _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar4_ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Uncore Power Management/Performance P-limit

knob.name: ProcessorEistEnable
knob.description: Enhanced Intel SpeedStep(R) Technology allows the system to dynamically adjust processor voltage and core frequency, which can result in decreased average power consumption and decreased average heat production. Contact your OS vendor regarding OS support of this feature.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Enhanced Intel SpeedStep(R) Tech

knob.name: TurboMode
knob.description: Intel(R) Turbo Boost Technology allows the processor to automatically increase its frequency if it is running below power, temperature, and current specifications.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar4_ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboModeAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Intel(R) Turbo Boost Technology

knob.name: EETurboDisable
knob.description: When Energy Efficient Turbo is enabled, the CPU cores only enter the turbo frequency when the PCU detects high utilization.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar4_ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboModeAvailable _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar4_TurboMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Energy Efficient Turbo

knob.name: ConfigTdpLevel
knob.description: AVX P1 level selection
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar4_ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/AVX P1

knob.name: IssTdpLevel
knob.description: Intel SST-PP Select allows user to choose from up to two additional base frequency conditions.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar4_ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR IssMaxLevel _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_DynamicIss _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Intel SST-PP

knob.name: DynamicIss
knob.description: Support Dynamic SST-PP Select.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( IssMaxLevel _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Dynamic SST-PP

knob.name: ProcessorActivePbf
knob.description: This Option allows Activate SST-BF to be enabled.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PbfCapableSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Activate SST-BF

knob.name: ProcessorConfigurePbf
knob.description: This Option allows BIOS to configure SST-BF High Priority Cores so that SW does not have to configure.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PbfCapableSystem _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_ProcessorActivePbf _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/Configure SST-BF

knob.name: ProcessorEistPsdFunc
knob.description: Choose HW_ALL/SW_ALL in _PSD return
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar4_ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU P State Control/EIST PSD Function

knob.name: ProcessorHWPMEnable
knob.description: Disable: Hardware chooses a P-state based on OS Request (Legacy P-States) Native Mode:Hardware chooses a P-state based on OS guidance Out of Band Mode:Hardware autonomously chooses a P-state (no OS guidance).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/Hardware P-States

option.text: Native Mode with No Legacy Support

knob.name: ProcessorHWPMInterrupt
knob.description: Enable/Disable Hardware PM Interrupt.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_ProcessorHWPMEnable _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/HardwarePM Interrupt

knob.name: ProcessorEPPEnable
knob.description: When enabled, HW masks EPP in CPUID[6].10 and uses the Energy Performance Bias Register for Energy vs. Performance Preference input.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/EPP Enable

knob.name: ProcessorAPSrocketing
knob.description: Enable/Disable the rocketing mechanism in the HWP p-state selection pcode algorithm. Rocketing enables the core ratio to jump to max turbo instantaneously as opposed to a smooth ramp up.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/APS Rocketing

knob.name: ProcessorScalability
knob.description: Enable/Disable the use of scalability in HWP pcode power efficiency algorithms. Scalability is the measure of estimated performance improvement for a given increase in core frequency.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/Scalability

knob.name: ProcessorRaplPrioritization
knob.description: This knob controls whether RAPL balancer is enabled. When enabled it activates per core power budgeting.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/Hardware P States/RAPL Prioritization

knob.name: PackageCState
knob.description: Set and specifies the lowest C-state for Processor package. C0/C1 sate is no package C-state support. C6 retention state provides more power saving than C6 non retention state. No Limit is no package C-state limit.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/Package C State

knob.name: ProcessorC1eEnable
knob.description: When Enabled, the CPU will switch to the Minimum Enhanced Intel SpeedStep Technology operating point when all execution cores enter C1. Frequency will switch immediately, followed by gradual Voltage switching. When Disabled, the CPU will not transit to the minimum Enhanced Intel SpeedStep Technology operating point when all cores enter C1.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/C1E

knob.name: C3Enable
knob.description: Enable/Disable Processor C3 (ACPI C2/C3) report to OS
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( C3Support _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/Processor C3

knob.name: C6Enable
knob.description: Enable/Disable Processor C6 (ACPI C3) report to OS.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Power n Performance/CPU C State Control/Processor C6

knob.name: ProcessorHyperThreadingDisable
knob.description: Intel(R) Hyper-Threading Technology allows multithreaded software applications to execute threads in parallel within each processor. Contact your OS vendor regarding OS support of this feature.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( HTAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Intel(R) Hyper-Threading Tech

knob.name: DfxD2cEn
knob.description: Direct To Core (D2C)
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Direct To Core (D2C)

knob.name: DfxD2kEn
knob.description: Direct To UPI (D2K)
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Direct To UPI (D2K)

knob.name: ActiveCoreNum
knob.description: Number of cores to enable in each processor package. Note: According above ?Total Processor Cores?, select value must ? ?Total Processor Cores?.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Active Processor Cores

knob.name: ProcessorVmxEnable
knob.description: Intel(R) Virtualization Technology allows a platform to run multiple operating systems and applications in independent partitions. Note: A change to this option requires the system to be powered off and then back on before the setting takes effect.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Intel(R) Virtualization Technology

knob.name: ProcessorSmxEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel(R) Trusted Execution Technology. Takes effect after reboot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorSmxEnable_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ( ( TpmEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TpmActivate _EQU_ 0 ) AND Tpm2Present _EQU_ 0 ) OR Nvar4_ProcessorVmxEnable _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_VTdSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Intel(R) TXT

knob.name: MlcStreamerPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: MLC Streamer is a speculative prefetch unit within the processor(s). Note: Modifying this setting may affect performance.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/MLC Streamer

knob.name: MlcSpatialPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: [Enabled] - Fetches adjacent cache line (128 bytes) when required data is not currently in cache. [Disabled] - Only fetches cache line with data required by the processor (64 bytes).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/MLC Spatial Prefetcher

knob.name: DCUStreamerPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: The next cache line will be prefetched into L1 data cache from L2 or system memory during unused cycles if it sees that the processor core has accessed several bytes sequentially in a cache line as data. [Disabled] - Only fetches cache line with data required by the processor (64 bytes).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( DCUPrefetcher_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/DCU Data Prefetcher

knob.name: DCUIPPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: The next cache line will be prefetched into L1 instruction cache from L2 or system memory during unused cycles if it sees that the processor core has accessed several bytes sequentially in a cache line as data.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( DCUPrefetcher_Hidden _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/DCU Instruction Prefetcher

knob.name: ProcessorX2apic
knob.description: Enable/disable extended APIC support
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/X2APIC

knob.name: CpuPaLimit
knob.description: Limit CPU physical address to 46 bits to support older Hyper-v.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Limit CPU PA to 46 bits

knob.name: CpuDbpEnable
knob.description: The DBP-F can be turned off by writing into the (MSR 792h [5]).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuStepping _LT_ 0x0A )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/DBP-F

knob.name: LlcPrefetchEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable LLC Prefetch on all threads.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/LLC Prefetch

knob.name: EnableTme
knob.description: Enable/Disable Total Memory Encryption (TME)
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar16_TmeCapability _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Total Memory Encryption (TME)

knob.name: EnableMktme
knob.description: Enable/Disable Total Memory Encryption Multi-Tenant (TME-MT).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar1_CpuPaLimit _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar1_EnableTme _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/Total Memory Encryption Multi-Tenant(TME-MT)

knob.name: SgxFactoryReset
knob.description: Perform SGX Factory Reset, on subseqent boot: delete all registration data, if SGX enabled will force Initial Platform Establishment flow.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar16_IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar4_NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar16_IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar16_EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 OR ( Nvar1_UmaBasedClustering _NEQ_ 0 AND ( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/SGX Factory Reset

knob.name: EnableSgx
knob.description: Enable/Disable Software Guard Extensions (SGX).
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar16_IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar4_NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar16_IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar16_EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 OR ( Nvar1_UmaBasedClustering _NEQ_ 0 AND ( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 ) ) ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 4 AND Nvar1_ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Processor Configuration/SW Guard Extensions (SGX)

knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar16_IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar4_NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar1_EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar16_IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar1_SgxFactoryReset _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar16_EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SataInterfaceMode

knob.depex: Sif( SataCntr_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: SataSpinUpOption
knob.description: If enabled for the AHCI Capable SATA controller, Staggered Spin-Up will be performed on drives attached to it. Otherwise these drives will all spin up at boot.
knob.depex: Sif( SataCntr_Hidden _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ SataTestMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _EQU_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Mass Storage Controller Configuration/SATA Controller (Port 0 - 7)/SATA HDD Staggered Spin-Up

knob.description: - AHCI enables the Advanced Host Controller Interface, which provides Enhanced SATA functionality. - RAID Mode provides host based RAID support on the onboard SATA ports.

knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced/Mass Storage Controller Configuration/sSATA Controller (Port 0 - 5)/AHCI Capable sSATA Controller

knob.name: sSataSpinUpOption
knob.description: If enabled for the AHCI Capable sSATA controller, Staggered Spin-Up will be performed on drives attached to it. Otherwise these drives will all spin up at boot.

knob.name: memhotSupport
knob.description: Configure MEMHOT Input and Output Mode: Mem Hot Sense Therm Throt or Mem Hot Output Therm Throt.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/HW Validation Test Only/MEMHOT Throttling Mode

knob.name: MemHotIn
knob.description: Configure Memhot input
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR Nvar1_memhotSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/HW Validation Test Only/MemHot Input Pin

knob.name: MemHotOut
knob.description: Configure Memhot output
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) OR Nvar1_memhotSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/HW Validation Test Only/MemHot Output Pin

knob.name: MemHotOuputAssertThreshold
knob.description: Configure MEMHOT Output Mode options: Enable/Disable the Throt Output high, mid and low bit fields.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar1_MemHotOut _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR Nvar17_CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR Nvar1_memhotSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/HW Validation Test Only/MEMHOT Output Throttling Mode Options

option.text: Enable only temphi, mid and low

knob.name: NgnDebugLock
knob.description: Enable\Disable Debug lock for PMem
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/HW Validation Test Only/Debug lock for PMem

knob.name: PowerOnPassword
knob.description: Enable Power On Password support. If enabled, password entry is required in order to boot the system.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( AdminName _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Security/Power On Password

knob.name: FrontPanelLockOut
knob.description: If enabled, locks the power button OFF function and the reset and NMI Diagnostic Interrupt buttons on the system?s front panel. If [Enabled] is selected, power-off and reset must be controlled via a system management interface, and the NMI Diagnostic Interrupt is not available.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Security/Front Panel Lockout

knob.name: TpmOperation
knob.description: [No Operation] - No changes to current state. [Turn On] - Enables and activates TPM. [Turn Off] - Disables and deactivates TPM. [Clear Ownership] - Removes TPM ownership n returns TPM to factory default state. Note: Setting returns to [No Operation] on every boot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( TpmPresent _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TpmHide _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Security/TPM Administrative Control

knob.name: Tpm2Operation
knob.description: Select one of the supported operation to change TPM2 state.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SyscfgSysinfoHiddenFlag _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( Tpm2Present _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TpmHide _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Security/TPM2 Operation

knob.name: ResetCaterr
knob.description: When enabled system gets reset upon encountering Catastrophic Error (CATERR); when disabled system does not get reset on CATERR.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Reset on CATERR

knob.name: ResetErr2
knob.description: When enabled system gets reset upon encountering ERR2 (Fatal error); when disabled system does not get reset on ERR2.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Reset on ERR2

knob.name: EnforcedPasswd
knob.description: Enables or Disables the Enforced Password support. Enabling it will allow the BIOS to send the Seed, Algorithm and password information to BMC.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( AdminName _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Enforced Password Support

knob.name: RandomPowerPolicy
knob.description: Allows a delay in powering up after a power failure, to reduce peak power requirements. The delay can be fixed or automatic between 60-300 seconds.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar20_SvrMngmntResumeAcPowerLoss _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Power Restore Delay

knob.name: RandomPowerOnDelayValue
knob.description: Fixed time period 60-300 seconds for Power Restore Delay.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar20_SvrMngmntResumeAcPowerLoss _EQU_ 0 OR RandomPowerPolicy _EQU_ 0 OR RandomPowerPolicy _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Power Restore Delay Value

knob.name: SvrMngmntFrb2Enable
knob.description: Fault Resilient Boot (FRB). The BIOS programs the BMC watchdog timer for approximately 6 minutes. If the BIOS does not complete POST before the timer expires, the BMC will reset the system.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/FRB-2 Enable

knob.name: Frb2Timeout
knob.description: If FRB-2 enabled, this is the timeout value that BIOS will use to configure the FRB-2 timer.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 ) _AND_ Sif( SvrMngmntFrb2Enable _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/FRB-2 Timeout Value

knob.name: OSBootWDTimer
knob.description: The BIOS programs the watchdog timer with the timeout value selected. If the OS does not complete booting before the timer expires, the BMC will reset the system and an error will be logged. Requires OS support or Intel Management Software Support.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/OS Boot Watchdog Timer

knob.name: OSBootWDTimerPolicy
knob.description: If the OS watchdog timer is enabled, this is the system action taken if the watchdog timer expires. [Reset] - System performs a reset. [Power Off] - System powers off.
knob.depex: Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 ) _AND_ Gif( OSBootWDTimer _EQU_ 0 OR Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/OS Boot Watchdog Timer Policy

knob.name: OSBootWDTimerTimeout
knob.description: If the OS watchdog timer is enabled, this is the timeout value the BIOS will use to configure the watchdog timer.
knob.depex: Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 ) _AND_ Gif( OSBootWDTimer _EQU_ 0 OR Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/OS Boot Watchdog Timer Timeout

knob.name: SvrMngmntAcpiIpmi
knob.description: If enabled, the BMC will be detectable by OSes which support plug and play loading of an IPMI driver. Do not enable this option if your OS does not support this driver.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Plug n Play BMC Detection

knob.name: SerialOverLanEnable_0
knob.description: Enable/disable Serial Over LAN feature for Baseboard Management Lan. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/SOL for Baseboard Mgmt

knob.name: SerialOverLanEnable_1
knob.description: Enable/disable Serial Over LAN feature for Baseboard Management Lan 2. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/SOL for Baseboard Mgmt2

knob.name: SerialOverLanEnable_2
knob.description: Enable/disable Serial Over LAN feature for Dedicated Mgmt NIC. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Sif( Nvar17_SecureKcsMode _EQU_ 0x05 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/SOL for Dedicated Mgmt NIC

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerialEnable
knob.description: Console redirection allows a serial port to be used for server management tasks. [Disabled] - No console redirection. [Serial Port A/B] - Configure serial port A/B for console redirection. Enabling this option will disable display of the Quiet Boot logo screen during POST. [Advanced ? Serial Port Configuration ? Serial A/B Enable] needs be enabled before enabling this option.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR SerialA _EQU_ 0 AND SerialB _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/Console Redirection

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerial1FlowCtrl
knob.description: Flow control is the handshake protocol. This setting must match the remote terminal application. [None] - Configure for no flow control. [RTS/CTS] - Configure for hardware flow control.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/Flow Control

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerial1BitRate
knob.description: Serial port transmission speed. This setting must match the remote terminal application.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/Baud Rate

knob.name: SvrMngmntConsRedirSerial1ConnectionType
knob.description: Character formatting used for console redirection. This setting must match the remote terminal application.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/Terminal Type

knob.name: TerminalResolution
knob.description: Remote Terminal Resolution.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/Terminal Resolution

knob.name: SvrMngmntDiagnosticMsgEnable
knob.description: [Enabled] -Display the diagnostic screen during POST. [Disabled] - Display the logo screen during POST.
knob.depex: Gif( SerialOverLanEnable_0 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_1 _EQU_ 1 OR SerialOverLanEnable_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( VariablePlatId _NEQ_ 0xFE OR SvrMngmntConsRedirSerialEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Server Management/Console Redirection/Diagnostic Messages

knob.name: BootTimeout
knob.description: The number of seconds BIOS will pause at the end of POST to allow the user to press the [F2] key for entering the BIOS Setup utility. Valid values are 0-65535. 1 is the default. A value of 65535 causes the system to go to the Boot Manager menu and wait for user input for every system boot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced Boot Options/System Boot Timeout

knob.name: EarlyBootTimeout
knob.description: The number of seconds the BIOS will pause before Option ROMs are dispatched.Valid values are 0-65535.Zero is the default.A value of 65535 causes the system to go to the Boot Manager menu and wait for user input for every system boot.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced Boot Options/Early System Boot Timeout

knob.name: UsbBootPriorityEnabled
knob.description: If enabled, newly discovered USB devices are moved to the top of their boot device category. If disabled, newly discovered USB devices are moved to the bottom of their boot device category.
knob.depex: Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Advanced Boot Options/USB Boot Priority

knob.name: MmcfgBase
knob.description: Select MMCFG Base
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/MMCFG Base

knob.name: MmcfgSize
knob.description: Select MMCFG Size
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/MMCFG Size

knob.name: MmiohBase
knob.description: Select MMIO High Base
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/MMIO High Base

knob.name: MmiohSize
knob.description: Selects the allocation size used to assign mmioh resources. Total mmioh space can be up to 32xgranularity. Per stack mmioh resource assignments are multiples of the granularity where 1 unit per stack is the default allocation.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/MMIO High Granularity Size

knob.name: IsocEn
knob.description: Isoc: Disable,Enable
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/Isoc Mode

knob.name: NumaEn
knob.description: Enable or Disable Non uniform Memory Access (NUMA).
knob.depex: Gif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/Numa

knob.name: VirtualNumaEnable
knob.description: Divide physical NUMA nodes into evenly sized virtual NUMA nodes in ACPI table. This may improve Windows performance on CPUs with more than 64 logical processors.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/Virtual Numa

knob.name: UmaBasedClustering
knob.description: UMA Based Clustering options include Disable (ALL2ALL), Hemisphere (2 cluster), and Quadrant (4 cluster, not supported on ICX). These option are only valid when SNC is disabled. If SNC is enabled, UMA-Based Clustering is automatically disabled by BIOS.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( ( SncEn _NEQ_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/UMA-Based Clustering

knob.name: Srat
knob.description: Publish the SRAT ACPI table to the OS.
knob.depex: Gif( NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/Publish SRAT

knob.name: SratMemoryHotPlug
knob.description: Fix for OS that does not support memory hot plug. Ex: SuSE SLES10 SP2. Enable by default. Disable will clear all hot plug bits and remove the hot plug entries in SRAT table.
knob.depex: Gif( NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Srat _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/SRAT Memory Hot Plug

knob.name: SratCpuHotPlug
knob.description: Set Processor Flag to Enabled for all processor entries in SRAT.
knob.depex: Gif( NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( Srat _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Common RefCode Configuration/SRAT CPU Hot Plug

knob.name: Xppdef
knob.description: Enable or disable the retimer workaround
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Retimer workaround

knob.name: Pci64BitResourceAllocation
knob.description: Enable or disable the allocation of 64-bit resources for PCI
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCI 64-Bit Resource Allocation

knob.name: PcieBiosTrainEnable
knob.description: Assume IIO is strapped for Wait-for-BIOS because straps are unreliable in A-0 Silicon
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Train by BIOS

knob.name: NtbLinkBiosTrainEn
knob.description: This knob enables or disables the BIOS to train the NTB link
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/NTB Link Train by BIOS

knob.name: DelayBeforePCIeLinkTraining
knob.description: Custom delay before PCIe link training on IIO ports
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Delay before link training

knob.name: PcieHotPlugEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCIe Hot Plug globally
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Hot Plug

knob.name: PcieAcpiHotPlugEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCIe ACPI Hot Plug globally, or allow per-port control. When Disabled, MSI is generated on HP event. When Enabled, _HPGPE message is generated.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe ACPI Hot Plug

knob.name: PcieLowLatencyRetimersEnabled
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCIe low latency retimers.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Low Latency Retimers

knob.name: SkipRetimersDetection
knob.description: Skip PCIe retimers detection to speedup the boot. Retimers are preent only in specific HW configurations.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Skip PCIe retimers detection

knob.name: CbDmaMultiCastEnable
knob.description: Enable CbDma MultiCast (for validation use)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/CbDma MultiCast Enable

knob.name: MultiCastEnable
knob.description: Enable MultiCast (for validation use)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/MultiCast Enable

knob.name: McastBaseAddrRegion
knob.description: Allocate memory for MultiCast test purpose
knob.depex: Sif( MultiCastEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/ MC BaseAddress Range

knob.name: McastIndexPosition
knob.description: MC_Index_Position value
knob.depex: Sif( MultiCastEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/ MC Index Position

knob.name: McastNumGroup
knob.description: MC_Num_Group value
knob.depex: Sif( MultiCastEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/ MC Num Group

knob.name: NoSnoopRdCfg
knob.description: NoSnoop Read Configuration
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/NoSnoop Read Config

knob.name: NoSnoopWrCfg
knob.description: NoSnoop Write Configuration
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/NoSnoop Write Config

knob.name: MaxReadCompCombSize
knob.description: Minimum or Maximum size
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Max Read Comp Comb Size

knob.name: ProblematicPort
knob.description: Selects whether problematic port lock flows need to be enabled in the system. Selection allows for P-P or NP-NP lock flows or neither.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Problematic port

knob.name: DmiAllocatingFlow
knob.description: Selects DMI Vc0/VCp writes selection as either allocating or non-allocating. Auto enables POR setting
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/DMI Allocating Write Flows

knob.name: PcieAllocatingFlow
knob.description: Selects Vc0/VCp writes selection for all CPU PCIe ports as either allocating or non-allocating. Auto enables POR setting
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Allocating Write Flows

knob.name: HaltOnDmiDegraded
knob.description: Enable this option to avoid the system to be halted on DMI width/link degradation
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Skip Halt On DMI Degradation

knob.name: RxClockWA
knob.description: HSX HSD# 4166557
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Rx Clock WA

knob.name: GlobalPme2AckTOCtrl
knob.description: Controls duration to wait between PME_TURN_OFF and PME_TO_ACK
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PME2ACK Timeout

knob.name: PCUF6Hide
knob.description: Hide Power Control Unit Device 30 Function 6
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Hide PCU Func 6

knob.name: EN1K
knob.description: Enables 1K granularity for I/O space decode in each of the virtual P2P bridges corresponding to root ports, and DMI ports
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/EN1K

knob.name: DualCvIoFlow
knob.description: Allow ucode enable Dual CV feature in the Cbo
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Dual CV IO Flow

knob.name: CoherentReadPart
knob.description: Configures Coherent Reads for Available Settings
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIE Coherent Read Partial

knob.name: CoherentReadFull
knob.description: Configures Coherent Reads for Available Settings
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIE Coherent Read Full

knob.name: CompletionTimeoutGlobal
knob.description: Enable / disable the PCIe Completion Timeout in Device Control2 register.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Enable PCI-E Completion Timeout (Global)

knob.name: CompletionTimeoutGlobalValue
knob.description: PCIe Completion Timeout to program in Device Control2 register.
knob.depex: Sif( CompletionTimeoutGlobal _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCI-E Global Timeout Value

knob.name: PcieGlobalAspm
knob.description: This option enables / disables the ASPM support for all downstream devices.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCI-E ASPM Support (Global)

knob.name: StopAndScream
knob.description: This option enables / disables PCIE Stop n Scream Support
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) OR SystemRasType _EQU_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIE Stop n Scream Support

knob.name: SnoopResponseHoldOff
knob.description: Sets Snoop Response Hold Off value, 256 cycles as Default
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Snoop Response Hold Off

knob.name: PCIe_LTR
knob.description: Auto/Disable - Turns off the Latency Tolerance Report feature of the Pcie Root port and endpoint. Enable - Turns on the Latency Tolerance Report feature.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Latency Tolerance Reporting

knob.name: PcieExtendedTagField
knob.description: Auto/Enable - BIOS sets 8-bit Tag Field for PCIe Root Port/EndPoint. Disable - BIOS sets 5-bit Tag Field for PCIe Root Port/EndPoint
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Extended Tag Enable

knob.name: Pcie10bitTag
knob.description: Enable or Disable PCIe 10-bit Tag Support
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe 10-bit Tag Enable

knob.name: PCIe_AtomicOpReq
knob.description: Enable or Disable Atomic Operation feature in PCIe Device Control2 register of IIO Root Ports and Endpoints
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Atomic Operation Request Support

knob.name: PcieMaxReadRequestSize
knob.description: Set requested MRRS in PCI hierarchy, or keep hw default.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe Max Read Request Size

knob.name: PciePtm
knob.description: Enable or Disable PTM Support
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe PTM Enable

knob.name: PcieRelaxedOrdering
knob.description: Pcie Relaxed Ordering Enable/Disable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Pcie Relaxed Ordering

knob.name: PciePhyTestMode
knob.description: PCIe PHY test mode Enable/Disable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/PCIe PHY test mode

knob.name: ConfigIOU0_0
knob.description: Selects PCIe port Bifurcation for selected slot(s)
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieBiosTrainEnable _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/IOU0 (IIO PCIe Port 1)

knob.name: ConfigIOU1_0
knob.description: Selects PCIe port Bifurcation for selected slot(s)
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieBiosTrainEnable _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/IOU1 (IIO PCIe Port 2)

knob.name: ConfigIOU2_0
knob.description: Selects PCIe port Bifurcation for selected slot(s)
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieBiosTrainEnable _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/IOU2 (IIO PCIe Port 3)

knob.name: ConfigIOU3_0
knob.description: Selects PCIe port Bifurcation for selected slot(s)
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieBiosTrainEnable _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/IOU3 (IIO PCIe Port 4)

knob.name: ConfigIOU4_0
knob.description: Selects PCIe port Bifurcation for selected slot(s)
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieBiosTrainEnable _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/IOU4 (IIO PCIe Port 5)

knob.name: CompletionTimeout_0
knob.description: Enable / disable the PCIe Completion Timeout in Device Control2 register.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Enable PCI-E Completion Timeout (Per-Port)

knob.name: VTdSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel Virtualization Technology for Directed I/O (VT-d) by reporting the I/O device assignment to VMM through DMAR ACPI Tables.
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/Intel VT for Directed I/O

knob.name: DmaCtrlOptIn
knob.description: Enable/Disable DMA_CTRL_PLATFORM_OPT_IN_FLAG in DMAR table in ACPI. Not compatible with Direct Device Assignment (DDA).
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/DMA Control Opt-In Flag

knob.name: InterruptRemap
knob.description: Enable/Disable VT-d Interrupt Remapping Support.
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/Interrupt Remapping

knob.name: X2ApicOptOut
knob.description: Enable/Disable X2APIC_OPT_OUT bit
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/X2APIC Opt Out

knob.name: ControlIommu
knob.description: Enable DMA Protection in Pre-boot environment (If DMAR table is installed in DXE and If VTD_INFO_PPI is installed in PEI.)
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/Pre-boot DMA Protection

knob.name: PostedInterrupt
knob.description: Enable/Disable VT-d Posted Interrupt Support.
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _NEQ_ 0 1 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/Posted Interrupt

knob.name: ATS
knob.description: Enable/Disable Non-Isoch VT-d Engine ATS support.
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _NEQ_ 0 1 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/ATS

knob.name: CoherencySupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable Non-Isoch VT-d Engine Coherency support
knob.depex: Sif( VtdAcsWa _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( VTdSupport _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _NEQ_ 0 1 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Intel VT for Directed I/O (VT-d)/Coherency Support (Non-Isoch)

knob.name: MSINFATEN_1
knob.description: Enables forcing non-fatal error propagation to the IIO core error logic for this port

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/Non-Fatal Err Over

knob.name: MSICOREN_1
knob.description: Enables forcing correctable error propagation to the IIO core error logic for this port
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/Corr Err Over

knob.name: ACPIPMEn_1

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/ACPI PME Interrupt

knob.name: P2PRdDis_1

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/P2P Memory Read

knob.name: DisPMETOAck_1

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/PME to ACK

knob.name: ACPIHP_1

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/HotPlug ACPI Mode

knob.name: ACPIPM_1
knob.description: When Enabled, _HPGPE message is generated Otherwise MSI is generated on PM event.

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/PM ACPI Mode

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/Unsupported Request

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/SRIS

option.text: Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid Push

knob.name: NtbPpd_0

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeOverride_0

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_0 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar1_0
knob.description: [IMBAR1SZ] Used to set the prefetchable Imbar1 size on primary side of NTB. Value range ?12...51? representing BAR sizes ?4KB ... 128PB?.
