knob.name: PEXPHIDE_1
knob.description: User can force to hide this root port from OS
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/Hide Port?

knob.name: MctpEn_1
knob.description: Enable/Disable MCTP
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_1 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1A/MCTP

knob.name: PciePortEnable_2
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_2
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_2 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: SLOTHPSUP_2
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Surprise Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_2 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/Surprise Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: PcieLinkDis_2
knob.description: This option disables the link so that the no training occurs but the CFG space is still active.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_2 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port Link Disable

knob.name: PciePortLinkSpeed_2
knob.description: Choose Link Speed for this PCIe port
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_2 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/Link Speed

knob.name: PciePortLinkMaxWidth_2
knob.description: Override the max link width that was set by bifurcation
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_2 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/Override Max Link Width

knob.name: DeEmphasis_2
knob.description: De-Emphais control (LNKCON2[6]) for this PCIe port.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_2 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortLinkSpeed_2 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port DeEmphasis

knob.name: PcieCommonClock_2
knob.description: Configure port clocking via LNKCON[6]. This refers to this components and the down stream component.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port Clocking

knob.name: PciePortClkGateEnable_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable Clock Gating for this PCIe port
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port Clock Gating

knob.name: PcieDataLinkFeatureExchangeEnable_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable data link feature negotiation in the Data Link Feature Capabilities (DLFCAP) register.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/Data Link Feature Exchange

knob.name: PcieMaxPayload_2
knob.description: Configure Max Payload Size Supported in PCIe Device Capabilities register.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port MPSS

knob.name: PcieDState_2
knob.description: Set to D0 for normal operation, D3Hot to be in low-power state
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_2 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port D-state

knob.name: PcieAspm_2
knob.description: This option enables / disables the ASPM (L1) support for the downstream devices.

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_5 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2A/IODC Configuration

option.text: Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid Push
Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid AllocNonAlloc
Enable for Remote InvItoM and Remote WCiLF

knob.name: NtbPpd_1
knob.description: [EMBAR1XBASE, EMBAR2XBASE] Configures port as TB, NTB-NTB, or NTB-RP (DON?T SELECT NTB-RP for legacy IIO on A0 Si!)

knob.name: PciePortEnable_6
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_6
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_6 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: SLOTHPSUP_6
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Surprise Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_6 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/Surprise Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: PcieLinkDis_6
knob.description: This option disables the link so that the no training occurs but the CFG space is still active.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_6 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port Link Disable

knob.name: PciePortLinkSpeed_6
knob.description: Choose Link Speed for this PCIe port
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_6 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/Link Speed

knob.name: PciePortLinkMaxWidth_6
knob.description: Override the max link width that was set by bifurcation
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_6 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/Override Max Link Width

knob.name: DeEmphasis_6
knob.description: De-Emphais control (LNKCON2[6]) for this PCIe port.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_6 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortLinkSpeed_6 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port DeEmphasis

knob.name: PcieCommonClock_6
knob.description: Configure port clocking via LNKCON[6]. This refers to this components and the down stream component.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port Clocking

knob.description: Enable/Disable Clock Gating for this PCIe port
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port Clock Gating

knob.description: Enable/Disable data link feature negotiation in the Data Link Feature Capabilities (DLFCAP) register.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_6 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port D-state

knob.name: PcieAspm_6

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3A/PCI-E Extended Sync

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3A/Compliance Mode

knob.name: NtbPpd_2
knob.description: [EMBAR1XBASE, EMBAR2XBASE] Configures port as TB, NTB-NTB, or NTB-RP (DON?T SELECT NTB-RP for legacy IIO on A0 Si!)

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar1_2

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_9 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_2 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_2 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_0_2
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2_0 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_9 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3A/Imbar2_0 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_1_2
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2_1 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_9 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3A/Imbar2_1 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_2
knob.description: [IMBAR2SZ] Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2 size on primary side of NTB. Value range ?12...51? representing BAR sizes ?4KB ... 128PB?.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_9 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_2 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3A/Embar1 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeEmBarSZ2_0_2
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Embar2_0 size on Secondary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3A/Embar2_0 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeEmBarSZ2_1_2
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Embar2_1 size on Secondary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3A/Embar2_1 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeEmBarSZ2_2
knob.description: [EMBAR2SZ] Used to set the prefetchable Embar2 size on secondary side of NTB. Value range ?12...51? representing BAR sizes ?4KB ... 128PB?.?
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_9 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_2 _EQU_ 1 )

knob.name: PciePortEnable_10
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_10 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3B/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_10
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_10 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_10 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3B/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: PcieLinkDis_10

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 3B/PCI-E Port Link Disable

knob.name: PciePortLinkSpeed_10

knob.name: PciePortEnable_13
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_13 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 4A/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_13
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_13 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_13 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 4A/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: SLOTHPSUP_13

knob.name: NtbPpd_2_inst_2
knob.description: [EMBAR1XBASE, EMBAR2XBASE] Configures port as TB, NTB-NTB, or NTB-RP (DON?T SELECT NTB-RP for legacy IIO on A0 Si!)
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_13 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 4A/Non-Transparent Bridge PCIe Port Definition

knob.name: NtbBarSizeOverride_2_inst_2
knob.description: [IMBAR1] If Enabled, BIOS will program NTB BAR size registers
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_13 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 4A/Enable NTB BARs

knob.name: NtbSplitBar_2_inst_2
knob.description: [IMBAR2, EMBAR2SZ] If Enabled, will use two 32 bit BARs instead of 64 bit BAR
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_13 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_2 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 4A/Enable SPLIT BARs

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar1_2_inst_2
knob.description: [IMBAR1SZ] Used to set the prefetchable Imbar1 size on primary side of NTB. Value range ?12...51? representing BAR sizes ?4KB ... 128PB?.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_13 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_2 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket0 Configuration/Port 4A/Imbar1 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_0_2_inst_2
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2_0 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 AND CpuChop _EQU_ 0 ) ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_13 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_2 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_2 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1A/Fatal Err Over

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1A/Non-Fatal Err Over

knob.name: MSICOREN_22
knob.description: Enables forcing correctable error propagation to the IIO core error logic for this port

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1A/Corr Err Over

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1A/P2P Memory Read

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1A/PME to ACK

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1A/PM ACPI Mode

knob.name: PciePortEnable_23
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_23 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1B/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_23
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_23 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_23 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1B/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: SLOTHPSUP_23

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 1B/Surprise Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: NtbPpd_4_inst_2

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_26 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2A/Non-Transparent Bridge PCIe Port Definition

knob.name: NtbBarSizeOverride_4_inst_2
knob.description: [IMBAR1] If Enabled, BIOS will program NTB BAR size registers
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_26 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_4 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2A/Enable NTB BARs

knob.name: NtbSplitBar_4_inst_2
knob.description: [IMBAR2, EMBAR2SZ] If Enabled, will use two 32 bit BARs instead of 64 bit BAR
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_26 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_4 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_4 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2A/Enable SPLIT BARs

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar1_4_inst_2
knob.description: [IMBAR1SZ] Used to set the prefetchable Imbar1 size on primary side of NTB. Value range ?12...51? representing BAR sizes ?4KB ... 128PB?.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_26 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_4 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_4 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2A/Imbar1 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_0_4_inst_2
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2_0 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_26 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_4 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_4 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_4 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: PciePortEnable_27
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_27 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_27
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: SLOTHPSUP_27

knob.name: PcieLinkDis_27

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_27 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_27 _EQU_ 0x00 )

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/Link Speed

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/Override Max Link Width

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port DeEmphasis

knob.name: PcieCommonClock_27

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port Clocking

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port MPSS

knob.name: PcieDState_27

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port D-state

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port L1 Exit Latency

knob.description: BUS0 DEVx FUN0 OFF 0x5A bit 0, Where X is 0-3
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_27 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/MSI

knob.name: ExtendedSync_27
knob.description: Enable / disable the Extended Sync Mode (D:x F:0 O:7Ch B:7) where x is 0-9

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Extended Sync

knob.name: PcieTxRxDetPoll_27

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Detect Wait Time

knob.name: ComplianceMode_27

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/Compliance Mode

knob.name: EOI_27

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 2B/EOI

knob.name: MSICOREN_27

option.text: Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid Push

knob.name: NtbPpd_5_inst_2

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_34 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket1 Configuration/Port 4A/Non-Transparent Bridge PCIe Port Definition

knob.name: NtbBarSizeOverride_5_inst_2

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_34 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_5 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar1_5_inst_2

option.text: Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid Push

knob.name: PciePortEnable_48
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_48
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_48 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: SLOTHPSUP_48
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Surprise Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_48 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/Surprise Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: PcieLinkDis_48
knob.description: This option disables the link so that the no training occurs but the CFG space is still active.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_48 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port Link Disable

knob.name: PciePortLinkSpeed_48
knob.description: Choose Link Speed for this PCIe port
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_48 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/Link Speed

knob.name: PciePortLinkMaxWidth_48
knob.description: Override the max link width that was set by bifurcation
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_48 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/Override Max Link Width

knob.name: DeEmphasis_48
knob.description: De-Emphais control (LNKCON2[6]) for this PCIe port.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_48 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortLinkSpeed_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port DeEmphasis

knob.name: PcieCommonClock_48
knob.description: Configure port clocking via LNKCON[6]. This refers to this components and the down stream component.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port Clocking

knob.name: PciePortClkGateEnable_48
knob.description: Enable/Disable Clock Gating for this PCIe port
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port Clock Gating

knob.name: PcieDataLinkFeatureExchangeEnable_48
knob.description: Enable/Disable data link feature negotiation in the Data Link Feature Capabilities (DLFCAP) register.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/Data Link Feature Exchange

knob.name: PcieMaxPayload_48
knob.description: Configure Max Payload Size Supported in PCIe Device Capabilities register.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port MPSS

knob.name: PcieDState_48
knob.description: Set to D0 for normal operation, D3Hot to be in low-power state
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port D-state

knob.name: PcieAspm_48
knob.description: This option enables / disables the ASPM (L1) support for the downstream devices.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E ASPM Support

knob.name: PcieL1Latency_48
knob.description: The length of time this port requires to complete transition from L1 to L0
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieAspm_48 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Port L1 Exit Latency

knob.name: MsiEn_48
knob.description: BUS0 DEVx FUN0 OFF 0x5A bit 0, Where X is 0-3
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/MSI

knob.name: ExtendedSync_48
knob.description: Enable / disable the Extended Sync Mode (D:x F:0 O:7Ch B:7) where x is 0-9
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_48 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 2B/PCI-E Extended Sync

knob.name: PcieTxRxDetPoll_48

knob.name: P2PRdDis_55

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4A/P2P Memory Read

knob.name: DisPMETOAck_55

knob.name: ACPIPM_55

option.text: Enable for Remote InvItoM Hybrid Push

knob.name: PciePortEnable_56
knob.description: In auto mode the BIOS will remove the EXP port if there is no device or errors on that device and the device is not HP capable. Enable/Disable is used to enable/disable the port and expose/hide its CFG space.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_56 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/PCI-E Port

knob.name: PcieHotPlugOnPort_56
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_56 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_56 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: SLOTHPSUP_56
knob.description: This option specifies if the link is considered Surprise Hot Plug capable.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_56 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_56 _EQU_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieHotPlugEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/Surprise Hot Plug Capable

knob.name: PcieLinkDis_56
knob.description: This option disables the link so that the no training occurs but the CFG space is still active.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_56 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( PciePortEnable_56 _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/PCI-E Port Link Disable

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/Link Speed

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/Override Max Link Width

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/PCI-E Port DeEmphasis

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/PCI-E Port Clocking

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_56 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/PCI-E Port Clock Gating

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/Data Link Feature Exchange

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/PCI-E Port MPSS

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 4B/PCI-E Port D-state

knob.description: This option enables / disables the ASPM (L1) support for the downstream devices.

knob.description: BUS0 DEVx FUN0 OFF 0x5A bit 0, Where X is 0-3

knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_59 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_14 _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: NtbSplitBar_14

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 5A/Enable SPLIT BARs

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar1_14
knob.description: [IMBAR1SZ] Used to set the prefetchable Imbar1 size on primary side of NTB. Value range ?12...51? representing BAR sizes ?4KB ... 128PB?.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_59 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbPpd_14 _EQU_ 0 OR NtbBarSizeOverride_14 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 5A/Imbar1 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_0_14
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2_0 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_59 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_14 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 5A/Imbar2_0 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_1_14
knob.description: Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2_1 size on primary side of NTB. Value ? than 12 or ? 29 (39 for BIOS supporting ? 4G PCI) disables BAR.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_59 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_14 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 5A/Imbar2_1 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeImBar2_14
knob.description: [IMBAR2SZ] Used to set the prefetchable Imbar2 size on primary side of NTB. Value range ?12...51? representing BAR sizes ?4KB ... 128PB?.
knob.depex: Sif( IioPresent_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HidePEXPMenu_59 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( NtbSplitBar_14 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/IIO Configuration/Socket2 Configuration/Port 5A/Imbar2 Size

knob.name: NtbBarSizeEmBarSZ1_14

knob.name: EnforcePOR
knob.description: Enable - Enforces Plan Of Record restrictions for DDR4 frequency and voltage programming. Disable - Disables this feature and user is able to run at higher frequencies, specified in the DDR Frequency Limit field (limited by processor support). Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting (current default is Enable).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Enforce POR

knob.name: EnforcePopulationPor
knob.description: Enable Memory Population POR Enforcement. Selecting Enforce Validated Populations will only allow populations that have been validated.
knob.depex: Sif( EnforcePOR _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Enforce Population POR

knob.name: pprType
knob.description: Selects Post Package Repair Type - Hard / Soft / Disabled. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Soft PPR.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PPR Type

knob.name: pprErrInjTest
knob.description: Enable / Disable support for c-script err inj test
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PPR Error Injection test

knob.name: DdrFreqLimit
knob.description: Maximum Memory Frequency Selections in Mhz. If Enforce POR is disabled, user will be able to run at higher frequencies than the memory support (limited by processor support). Do not select Reserved
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Frequency

knob.name: DdrFreqLimit_inst_2
knob.description: Maximum Memory Frequency Selections in Mhz. If Enforce POR is disabled, user will be able to run at higher frequencies than the memory support (limited by processor support). Do not select Reserved
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Frequency

knob.name: imcBclk
knob.description: Auto, 100MHz or 133MHz
knob.depex: Gif( DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 0 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 2 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 3 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 5 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 6 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 8 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 9 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 10 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 11 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 12 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 14 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 15 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 16 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 17 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 18 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 20 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 21 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 22 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 23 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 24 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 26 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 27 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 28 OR DdrFreqLimit _EQU_ 29 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/IMC BCLK

knob.name: PanicWm
knob.description: Auto selects Low WM (Hi/Panic - 1/2) for 16Gb-based DIMMs and High WM (Hi/Panic - 8/9) for other DIMM configs. Low WM can mitigate power delivery issues with 128GB and larger DIMMs. Low WM can also mitigate failures due to row hammer traffic patterns. High WM can provide better performance when power delivery and row hammer is not a concern.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Refresh Watermarks

knob.name: promoteMrcWarnings
knob.description: Determines if MRC warnings are promoted to system level
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/MRC Promote Warnings

knob.name: promoteWarnings
knob.description: Determines if warnings are promoted to system level
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Promote Warnings

knob.name: Nvar2_haltOnMemErr
knob.description: Halt on mem Training Error Disable/Enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Halt on mem Training Error

knob.name: AepNotSupportedException
knob.description: 100 series PMem Not Supported Exception Enable/Disable
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/100 series PMem Not Supported Exception

knob.name: NvmMediaStatusException
knob.description: PMem MediaStatus Exception Enable/Disable
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem MediaStatus Exception

knob.name: MultiThreaded
knob.description: Enable - Executes the Memory Reference Code multi-threaded. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to MRC default setting; current default is Enable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Multi-Threaded MRC

knob.name: spdCrcCheck
knob.description: Enable to turn on checking the SPD CRC
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/SPD CRC Check

knob.name: logParsing
knob.description: Enables additional output in debug log for easier machine parsing
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Enhanced Log Parsing

knob.name: lrdimmModuleDelay
knob.description: When Disabled, MRC will not use SPD bytes 90-95 for LRDIMM Module Delay. When Auto, MRC will boundary check the values and use default values, if SPD is 0 or out of range
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/LRDIMM Module Delay

knob.name: SetMemTested
knob.prompt: Allow Untested Memory for DXE Drivers
knob.description: Enable - Sets the TESTED flag for all memory in PEI, making it available for DXE Drivers? usage
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Allow Untested Memory for DXE Drivers

knob.name: SmartTestKey
knob.description: Number of SmartTest Key
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/SmartTestKey

knob.name: HwMemTest
knob.description: Enable - Enables memory test during normal boot. Disable - Disables this feature.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/MemTest

knob.name: MemTestLoops
knob.description: Number of memory test loops during normal boot, set to 0 to run memtest infinitely
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/MemTest Loops

knob.name: AdvMemTestOptions
knob.description: This option is a bit mask[19:0]: All 0 - disabled: bit-0-XMATS8, bit-1-XMATS16, bit-2-XMATS32, bit-3-XMATS64, bit-4-WCMATS8, bit-5-WCMCH8, bit-6-GNDB64, bit-7-MARCHCM64, bits[8:10]-Reserved, bit-11-TWR, bit-12-DATARET, bit-13-MATS8TC1, bit-14-MATS8TC2, bit-15-MATS8TC3, bit-16-SK-HYNIX, bit-17-SAMSUNG, bit-18-MICRON, bit-19-SCRAM_X2
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Options

knob.name: AdvMemTestPpr
knob.description: This option enable/disable ppr flow for MemTest
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest PPR

knob.name: AdvMemTestRetryAfterRepair
knob.description: Enable/disable Retry of the current Adv MemTest step after a PPR repair is done.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Retry After Repair

knob.name: AdvMemTestResetList
knob.prompt: Adv MemTest Reset Failure Tracking List
knob.description: Enable/disable Reset of the Row Failure Tracking List after each Adv MemTest option. Useful for testing performance of multiple options.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Reset Failure Tracking List

knob.name: AdvMemTestCondition
knob.description: Auto - set test conditions based on test type; Manual - specify global test conditions; Disable - Do not apply test conditions.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Conditions

knob.name: AdvMemTestCondVdd
knob.description: Specify VDD level in units of mV.
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestCondition _NEQ_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest VDD Level

knob.name: AdvMemTestCondTwr
knob.description: Specify tWR timing in units of tCK.
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestCondition _NEQ_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest tWR

knob.name: AdvMemTestCondTrefi
knob.description: Specify tREFI (refresh rate) timing in units of tCK.
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestCondition _NEQ_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest tREFI

knob.name: AdvMemTestCondPause
knob.description: Specify a pause delay in units of usec. This is a time period where refresh is disabled between write and read sequences.
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestCondition _NEQ_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Pause

knob.name: TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable
knob.description: Enable - Enables training results to be offset. Disable - Disables this feature; current default is Enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Training Result Offset

knob.name: OffsetRecEn
knob.description: How much to offset RecEnDelay final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105 (Rnage -32 to +32)
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset RecEnDelay

knob.name: OffsetTxDq
knob.description: How much to offset TxDq final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset TxDq

knob.name: OffsetRxDq
knob.description: How much to offset RxDq final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset RxDq

knob.name: OffsetTxVref
knob.description: How much to offset TxVref final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset TxVref

knob.name: OffsetRxVref
knob.description: How much to offset RxVref final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset RxVref

knob.name: OffsetCmdAll
knob.description: How much to offset CmdAll final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset CmdAll

knob.name: OffsetCmdVref
knob.description: How much to offset CmdVref final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset CmdVref

knob.name: OffsetCtlAll
knob.description: How much to offset CtlAll final memory training results. +ve starts at 0 - ? for an offset of +7, enter 7; -ve starts at 100 - ? for an offset of -5, enter 105
knob.depex: Sif( TrainingResultOffsetFunctionEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Offset CtlAll

knob.name: DdrMemoryType
knob.description: Selects the Memory type supported by this platform.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Type

knob.name: AttemptFastBoot
knob.description: Enable - Portions of memory reference code will be skipped when possible to increase boot speed on warm boots. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enable.
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Attempt Fast Boot

knob.name: AttemptFastBoot_inst_2
knob.description: Enable - Portions of memory reference code will be skipped when possible to increase boot speed on warm boots. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Disable.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Attempt Fast Boot

knob.name: AttemptFastBootCold
knob.description: Enable - Portions of memory reference code will be skipped when possible to increase boot speed on cold boots. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Disable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Attempt Fast Cold Boot

knob.name: MemTestOnColdFastBoot
knob.description: Enable - Enables memory test during cold fast boot. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Disable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/MemTest On Cold Fast Boot

knob.name: RmtOnColdFastBoot
knob.description: Enable - Enables Rank Margin Tool on Cold Fast Boot. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Disable. Should be disabled in production releases.
knob.depex: Sif( LegacyRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/RMT On Cold Fast Boot

knob.name: LegacyRmt
knob.description: Enable - Enables the legacy rank margin tool to run after DDR4 memory training. Disable - Disables this feature. Current default is Enable. Should be disabled in production releases.
knob.depex: Sif( LegacyRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Rank Margin Tool

knob.name: RmtOnAdvancedTraining
knob.description: Execute RMT after advanced Memory Training, as per memory policy
knob.depex: Sif( LegacyRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( LegacyRmt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Rmt on Advanced Memtest

knob.name: EnableNgnBcomMargining
knob.description: Enables DDRT DIMM BCOM margining support for RMT and BSSA
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/DDRT DIMM BCOM Margining Support

knob.name: bdatEn
knob.description: Enable Disables publishing BDAT ACPI Table
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BDAT

knob.name: ScrambleEnDDRT
knob.description: Enable - Enables data scrambling for PMem. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enable.
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Data Scrambling for PMem

knob.name: ScrambleEn
knob.description: Enable - Enables data scrambling for DDR4 and DDR5. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Data Scrambling for DDR4/5

knob.name: allowCorrectableError
knob.description: Enable - Allows correctable errors during memory training. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Disable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Allow Memory Training Correctable Error

knob.name: allowCorrectableMemTestError
knob.description: Enable - Logs error and allows correctable errors during memory test(DIMM Rank not removed). Disable - Logs error and removes DIMM Rank. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Allow Memory Test Correctable Error

knob.name: WrCRC
knob.description: Enable - Enables Write CRC. Disable - Disables this feature.
knob.depex: Sif( ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/WR CRC feature Control

knob.name: dimmIsolation
knob.description: Enable - Enables DIMM Isolation for Command/Address Parity and Write CRC. Disable - Disables this feature; current default is Enable.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/DIMM Isolation Enable

knob.name: WritePreamble
knob.description: Override WritePreamble to 1TCLK or 2TCLK. Auto will set WritePreamble timing to 1TCLK. PMem configurations do not support 2TCLK.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Write Preamble TCLK

knob.name: ReadPreamble
knob.description: Override ReadPreamble to 1TCLK or 2TCLK. Auto will set ReadPreamble timing to 2TCLK for speeds 2933 and above. DDR4 speeds below 2400 and PMem configurations do not support 2TCLK.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Read Preamble TCLK

knob.name: RecEnDelayAverage
knob.description: TA Floor enforces t_rrdr, t_rrdd minimum of 3; Rcven Ave attempts to match Rcven logic delay across ranks
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Rank Switch Configuration

knob.name: ScrambleSeedLow
knob.description: Low 32 bits of the scrambling seed
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Scrambling Seed Low

knob.name: ScrambleSeedHigh
knob.description: High 32 bits of the scrambling seed
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Scrambling Seed High

knob.name: ADREn
knob.description: Enables the detecting and enabling of ADR This is not available if eADR is enabled since eADR requires ADR to be enabled
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( EadrSupport _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Enable ADR

knob.name: LegacyADRModeEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Legacy ADR Mode This is not available if eADR is enabled since eADR requires this mode to be enabled
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( EadrSupport _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ADREn _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Legacy ADR Mode

knob.name: MinNormalMemSize
knob.description: Minimum memory size assigned as system memory when only JEDEC NVDIMMs are present
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( EadrSupport _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ADREn _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Minimum System Memory Size

knob.name: NvDimmEnergyPolicy
knob.description: Set the energy policy for NVDIMMs
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/NVDIMM Energy Policy

knob.name: ADRDataSaveMode
knob.description: Data Save Mode for ADR. Batterybacked or Type 01 NVDIMM
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( ( ADREn _EQU_ 0 ) AND ( EadrSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/ADR Data Save Mode

knob.name: check_pm_sts
knob.description: Use the PCH_PM_STS regigister as a recovery indicator
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( ( ADREn _EQU_ 0 ) AND ( EadrSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) ) _AND_ Sif( ADRDataSaveMode _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Check PCH_PM_STS

knob.name: check_platform_detect
knob.description: Use the PlatformDetectADR function as a recovery indicator
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( ( ADREn _EQU_ 0 ) AND ( EadrSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) ) _AND_ Sif( ADRDataSaveMode _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Check PlatformDetectADR

knob.name: eraseArmNVDIMMS
knob.description: Enables/Disables Erasing and Arming NVDIMMs
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( ( ADREn _EQU_ 0 ) AND ( EadrSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) ) _AND_ Sif( ADRDataSaveMode _NEQ_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Erase-Arm NVDIMMs

knob.name: restoreNVDIMMS
knob.description: Enables/Disables Automatic resotring of NVDIMMs
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( ( ADREn _EQU_ 0 ) AND ( EadrSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) ) _AND_ Sif( ADRDataSaveMode _NEQ_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Restore NVDIMMs

knob.name: interNVDIMMS
knob.description: Controls if NVDIMMs are interleaved together or not
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( ( ADREn _EQU_ 0 ) AND ( EadrSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) ) _AND_ Sif( ADRDataSaveMode _NEQ_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Interleave NVDIMMs

knob.name: CustomRefreshRateEn
knob.description: Enable/disable a custom memory refresh rate
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Custom Refresh Enable

knob.name: CustomRefreshRate
knob.description: Refresh Rate in 0.1x units of the standard 7.8 usec interval. Valid range is 20 to 40 (i.e. 2x to 4x)
knob.depex: Sif( ( CustomRefreshRateEn _EQU_ 0 ) OR ( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Custom Refresh Rate

knob.name: CustomRefreshRate_inst_2
knob.description: Refresh Rate in 0.1x units of the standard 7.8 usec interval. Valid range is 20 to 80 (i.e. 2x to 8x)
knob.depex: Sif( CustomRefreshRateEn _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Custom Refresh Rate

knob.name: refreshMode
knob.description: Enable/Disable 2x Refresh
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/2x Refresh Enable

knob.name: dllResetTestLoops
knob.description: Set this to the number of loops to execute the DDL reset test. The test will execute RMT for the provided number of loops without DLL resets and then it will exectue RMT for the same number of loops with DLL resets.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/DLL Reset Test

knob.name: oppReadInWmm
knob.description: Enable - Enables issuing read commands opportunistically during Write Major Mode. Disable - Disables this feature. Auto - Sets it to the MRC default setting; current default is Enable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Opp read during WMM

knob.name: normOppInterval
knob.description: Set normal operation duration interval (0 - 65535)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Normal Operation Duration

knob.name: smbSpeed
knob.description: Sets DDR4 SMBus Clock Frequencies For SPD Access. Current default is 700Khz. Note: If Intel Optane Persistent Memory (PMem) is present, SMBus Clock Frequency is restricted to 400Khz regardless of this setting.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/SMB Clock Frequency

knob.name: SmbSpdAccess
knob.description: Allow Cpu Spd Smbus access to be Locked\UnLocked before booting to OS
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/SPD-SMBUS Access

knob.name: mrcRepeatTest
knob.description: When enabled, MRC will train the memory and then power cycle over and over to stress MRC
knob.depex: Gif( AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/DDR Cycling

knob.name: memFlows
knob.description: Enable(1)/Disable(0) memory training steps in MRC flow; X_OVER-BIT0; SENSE_AMP-BIT1; E_CMDCLK-BIT2; REC_EN-BIT3; RD_DQS-BIT4; WR_LVL-BIT5; WR_FLYBY-BIT6; WR_DQ-BIT7; CMDCLK-BIT8; RD_ADV-BIT9; WR_ADV-BIT10; RD_VREF-BIT11; WR_VREF-BIT12; RT_OPT-BIT13; RX_TX_DESKEW-BIT14; TX_EQ-BIT15; IMODE-BIT16; EARLY_RID-BIT17; DQ_SWIZ-BIT18; LRBUF_RD-BIT19; LRBUF_WR-BIT20; RANK_MARGIN-BIT21; EARLY_WR_VREF-BIT22; EARLY_RD_VREF-BIT23; LR_RD_VREF-BIT24; MEM_INIT-BIT25; DQ_SWIZZLE_EN-BIT26; NORMAL_MODE-BIT27; CMD_VREF-BIT28; LR_WR_VREF-BIT29; MEMTEST-BIT30; E_CTLCLK-BIT31
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Mem Flows

knob.name: memFlowsExt
knob.description: Enable(1)/Disable(0) memory training steps in MRC flow; RX_CTLE_EN-BIT0; PXC_EN-BIT1; CMD_NORM_EN-BIT2; LRDIMM_BKSIDE_DQ-BIT3; DRAM_RX_EQ-BIT4; BCOM-BIT5; CHECK_POR-BIT6; MMRC_INIT-BIT7; THROTTLING_EARLY-BIT8; THROTTLING-BIT9; POST_TRAINING-BIT10; E_CONFIG-BIT11; L_CONFIG-BIT12; BIOS_SSA_RMT_EN-BIT13; MCODT_EN-BIT14; MCRON_EN-BIT15; DIMMRON_EN-BIT16; QCA_EN-BIT17; X16_DQSWIZ-BIT18; TCO_COMP_EN-BIT19; TX_SLEW_RATE_EN-BIT20; INIT_MEMMAP-BIT21; CMD_TX_EQ_EN-BIT22; RCOMP_STAT_LEG-BIT23; DDJC_EN-BIT24; RX_DFE_EN-BIT25; DCS-BIT26; QCS-BIT27; DCA-BIT28; HW_XOVER_EN-BIT29; CMI_SMEE_CFG_EN-BIT30; QxCA_CLK_EN-BIT31
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Mem FlowsExt

knob.name: memFlowsExt2
knob.description: Enable(1)/Disable(0) memory training steps in MRC flow; TX_DQDQS_PRE_DFE-BIT0; TX_DQDQS_POST_DFE-BIT1; DCA_DUTY-BIT2; RCD_DCA_DFE-BIT3; RX_DQDQS_PRE_DFE_BIT4; RX_DQDQS_POST_DFE_BIT5; TX_PERIODIC_RETRAIN-BIT6; CA_SLEW_RATE-BIT7; DCA_TCO-BIT8; E_REQ_CLK-BIT9; TURNAROUND_TRAIN-BIT10; RX_DFE-BIT11; TX_DFE-BIT12; DQ_SLEW_RATE-BIT13; DB_DFE-BIT14
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Mem FlowsExt2

knob.name: memFlowsExt3
knob.description: Enable(1)/Disable(0) memory training steps in MRC flow
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Mem FlowsExt3

knob.name: Blockgnt2cmd1cyc
knob.description: Enable\Disable BLOCK GNT2CMD1CYC
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BLOCK GNT2CMD1CYC

knob.name: Disddrtopprd
knob.description: Enable\Disable Disable DDRT DIMM OPPRD
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Disable DDRT DIMM OPPRD

knob.name: cmdSetupPercentOffset
knob.description: Cmd setup / hold percent offset for late cmd traning result. The possible values are from 0 to 100
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Cmd Setup % Offset

knob.name: PeriodicRcomp
knob.description: Anto(2)/Enable(1)/Disable(0) Memory Periodic Rcomp cycles
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 6 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Periodic Rcomp

knob.name: PeriodicRcompInterval
knob.description: Memory Periodic Rcomp interval. The possible values for regsiter COMP_INTERVAL are from 0 to 15. The time is indicated by power(2,COMP_INTERVAL)*10.24 usec.
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 6 ) ) _AND_ Sif( PeriodicRcomp _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Periodic Rcomp Interval

knob.name: TrainingCompOptions
knob.description: Options for issuing a Compensation cycle (RCOMP) at specific points in training
knob.depex: Sif( ( ( NOT PeriodicRcomp _NEQ_ 1 ) AND ( CpuType _EQU_ 6 ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Training Compensation Options Values

option.text: One RCOMP cycle only on PHY Init (MMRC Init)
One RCOMP cycle after every JEDEC Init
One RCOMP cycle right before every training step

knob.description: Enable/Disable Rx DFE Training. AUTO will enable if DDR Freq ?- 2400. Enable or Disable will control Rx DFE regardless of frequency

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Training/Rx Dfe Training

knob.name: TxRiseFallSlewRate
knob.prompt: TX Rise Fall Slew Rate Training
knob.description: Enable/Disable TX Rise Fall Slew Rate Training. AUTO will enable if DDR Freq ?- 2933. Enable or Disable will control TXRFSR regardless of frequency
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Training/TX Rise Fall Slew Rate Training

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Training/RoundTrip Latency Training

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Training/Read Vref Centering

knob.name: thermalthrottlingsupport
knob.description: Configure Thermal Throttling Mode.
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Thermal/Throttling Mode

knob.name: OffPkgMemToThermTrip
knob.description: If set to 0, processor will ignore offpkg Memtrip to thermtrip tree. If set to 1 processor will include offpkg Memtrip to thermtrip tree.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 6 ) _AND_ Sif( thermalthrottlingsupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Thermal/OFF PKG MEM TO THERMTRIP

knob.name: OffPkgMemToMemTrip
knob.description: If set to 0, processor will ignore offpkg memtrip to memtrip tree. If set to 1 processor will include offpkg memtrip to memtrip tree.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 6 ) _AND_ Sif( thermalthrottlingsupport _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Thermal/OFF PKG MEM TO MEMTRIP

knob.name: MemTripReporting
knob.description: If set to 0, processor will ignore all Mem Trip tree. If set to 1 processor will include all Mem Trip tree.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 6 ) _AND_ Sif( thermalthrottlingsupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Thermal/MEMTRIP REPORTING

knob.name: CmiInitOption
knob.description: Select Auto/Register default Value for spreadsheet value programming/normal register default value
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/CMI Init Configuration/CMI Init Option

knob.name: TempRefreshOption
knob.description: Option to manually enter Temperature refresh value. Select Manual to enter value, Auto for default
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Select Temperature Refresh Value

knob.name: HalfxRefreshValue
knob.description: Set Halfx Temperature refresh value
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( TempRefreshOption _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Set Halfx Temperature Refresh

knob.name: TwoxRefreshValue
knob.description: Set TWOx Temperature refresh value
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( TempRefreshOption _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Set TWOx Temperature Refresh

knob.name: FourxRefreshValue
knob.description: Set FOURx Temperature refresh value
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( TempRefreshOption _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Set FOURx Temperature Refresh

knob.name: memhotSupport
knob.description: Configure MEMHOT Input and Output Mode: Mem Hot Sense Therm Throt or Mem Hot Output Therm Throt.
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/MEMHOT Throttling Mode

knob.name: MemHotOuputAssertThreshold
knob.description: Configure MEMHOT Output Mode options: Enable/Disable the Throt Output high, mid and low bit fields.
knob.depex: Sif( memhotSupport _NEQ_ 1 OR memhotSupport _NEQ_ 3 OR ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/MEMHOT Output Throttling Mode Options

option.text: Enable only temphi, mid and low

knob.name: memhotSupport_inst_2
knob.description: Configure MEMHOT Input and Output Mode: Mem Hot Sense Therm Throt or Mem Hot Output Therm Throt.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/MEMHOT Throttling Mode

knob.name: MemHotIn
knob.description: Configure Memhot input
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR memhotSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/MemHot Input Pin

knob.name: MemHotOut
knob.description: Configure Memhot output
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) OR memhotSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/MemHot Output Pin

knob.name: MemHotOuputAssertThreshold_inst_2
knob.description: Configure MEMHOT Output Mode options: Enable/Disable the Throt Output high, mid and low bit fields.
knob.depex: Sif( MemHotOut _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR memhotSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/MEMHOT Output Throttling Mode Options

option.text: Enable only temphi, mid and low

knob.name: CkeProgramming
knob.description: Configures CKE Throttling
knob.depex: Gif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) AND AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/CKE Throttling

knob.name: SrefProgramming
knob.description: Select manual or auto programming Self Refresh feature
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/SREF Feature

knob.name: PkgcSrefEn
knob.description: Enables or disables PKGC Self Refresh
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/PKGC SREF EN

knob.name: DataDllOff
knob.description: Enables or disables Data DLL Off feature of Low Power Mode
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/Data DLL Off EN

knob.name: CkeIdleTimer
knob.description: CKE Idle Timer in ns. Value should be greater than 20 ns
knob.depex: Sif( CkeProgramming _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) AND AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/CKE Feature/CKE Idle Timer

knob.name: ApdEn
knob.description: APD On/Off
knob.depex: Sif( CkeProgramming _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) AND AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/CKE Feature/APD

knob.name: PpdEn
knob.description: PPD On/Off
knob.depex: Sif( CkeProgramming _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) AND AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ApdEn _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/CKE Feature/PPD

knob.name: DdrtCkeEn
knob.description: PMem CKE On/Off
knob.depex: Sif( CkeProgramming _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) AND AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AepOnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/CKE Feature/PMem CKE

knob.name: OppSrefEn
knob.description: Enables or disables opportunistic self-refresh
knob.depex: Sif( SrefProgramming _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OppSrefVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) AND AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/Self Refresh Feature/Opportunistic SR

knob.name: DdrtSrefEn
knob.description: PMem SELF REFRESH
knob.depex: Sif( SrefProgramming _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( OppSrefEn _EQU_ 0 OR AepOnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/Self Refresh Feature/PMem SELF REFRESH

knob.name: MdllOffEn
knob.description: MDLL OFF
knob.depex: Sif( SrefProgramming _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/Self Refresh Feature/MDLL OFF

knob.name: CkMode
knob.description: Configures CK behavior during self-refresh
knob.depex: Sif( SrefProgramming _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/Memory Power Savings Advanced Options/Self Refresh Feature/CK in SR

knob.name: XMPMode
knob.description: Selects the XMP profile to use

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/XMP Profile

knob.name: XMPMode_inst_2
knob.description: Selects the XMP profile to use
knob.depex: Sif( XMPProfilesSup _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/XMP Profile

knob.description: Selects the XMP profile to use

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/XMP Profile

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/Command Timing

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/tWR

knob.depex: Sif( XMPMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/tRFC

knob.description: 0 - Auto else Desired tRRD

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/tRRD

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/tRRD_L

knob.depex: Sif( XMPMode _EQU_ 0 )

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/tFAW

knob.description: 0 - Auto else Desired tRC

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/tRC
