knob.depex: Sif( XMPMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Timings Override/tCWL

knob.name: volMemMode
knob.description: Selects 1LM or 2LM mode for volatile memory. For 2LM memory mode, BIOS will try to configure 2LM but if BIOS is unable to configure 2LM, volatile memory mode will fall back to 1LM
knob.depex: Sif( ( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 AND HbmSku _EQU_ 0 ) OR NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Map/Volatile Memory Mode

knob.name: CacheMemType
knob.description: Selects the volatile memory type to use as cache
knob.depex: Sif( ( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 AND HbmSku _EQU_ 0 ) OR NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( HbmSku _EQU_ 0 OR volMemMode _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Map/2LM Memory Type

knob.name: DdrCacheSize
knob.description: Selects the DDR Cache Size for each populated channel used for 2LM configurations. Any remaining DDR will be mapped as 1LM memory.
knob.depex: Sif( ( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 AND HbmSku _EQU_ 0 ) OR NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( volMemMode _NEQ_ 1 OR CacheMemType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Map/DDR Cache Size

knob.name: PmemCaching
knob.description: Selects whether caching is enabled for the memory region
knob.depex: Sif( ( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 AND HbmSku _EQU_ 0 ) OR NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( volMemMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Map/AppDirect cache

knob.name: EadrSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable eADR capability in the platform, Pmem/AppDirect caching knob takes precedence
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Map/eADR Support

knob.name: EadrCacheFlushMode
knob.description: Sets CPU cache flush execution mode
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EadrSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Map/CPU Cache Flush Mode

knob.name: FadrSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable fADR capability in the platform
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory Map/fADR Support

knob.name: FactoryResetClear
knob.description: Enable\Disable Factory Reset/Clear (PMem power policy setting will be also set to default values); This knob remains enabled after reset
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/PMem Factory Reset/Clear

knob.name: FastZeroMemSupport
knob.description: Enable or disable boot-time fast zero memory support
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR NumaEn _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Boot-time Fast Zero Memory

knob.name: DcpmmAveragePowerLimit
knob.prompt: 200 Series PMem Average Power Limit (in mW)
knob.description: Power limit in mW used for average power. Valid range for power limit starts from 10000mW and must be a multiple of 250mW.
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( DcpmmApiVersion200OrGreaterOnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/200 Series PMem Average Power Limit (in mW)

knob.name: DcpmmAveragePowerTimeConstant
knob.prompt: 200 Series PMem Turbo Average Power Time Constant (in mSec)
knob.description: Value used as a base time window for power usage measurements.
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( DcpmmApiVersion200OnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/200 Series PMem Turbo Average Power Time Constant (in mSec)

knob.name: DcpmmMbbAveragePowerTimeConstant
knob.prompt: 200 Series PMem Memory Bandwidth Boost(MBB) Average Power Time Constant (in mSec)
knob.description: Value used as a base time window for power usage measurements.Valid range starts from 1000msec to 120000msec(must be an increment of 1000msec).
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( DcpmmApiVersion201OnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/200 Series PMem Memory Bandwidth Boost(MBB) Average Power Time Constant (in mSec)

knob.name: DcpmmMbbFeature
knob.prompt: 200 Series PMem Turbo/Memory Bandwidth Boost(MBB) Feature
knob.description: Allows enabling and disabling of the Turbo/Memory Bandwidth Boost(MBB) Feature on the Module.
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( DcpmmApiVersion200OrGreaterOnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/200 Series PMem Turbo/Memory Bandwidth Boost(MBB) Feature

knob.name: DcpmmMbbMaxPowerLimit
knob.prompt: 200 Series PMem Turbo/Memory Bandwidth Boost Feature(MBB) Power Limit (in mW)
knob.description: Power limit in mW used for limiting the Turbo/Memory Bandwidth Boost(MBB) Feature power consumption.Valid range for Turbo Power Limit starts from 15000mW.
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( DcpmmApiVersion200OrGreaterOnSystem _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( DcpmmMbbFeature _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/200 Series PMem Turbo/Memory Bandwidth Boost Feature(MBB) Power Limit (in mW)

knob.name: NgnArsPublish
knob.description: Enable\Disable publishing of the Address Range Scrub capability to the OS
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Publish ARS capability

knob.name: NgnCmdTime
knob.description: Select 1N\2N PMem Command tme
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/PMem CMD Time

knob.name: NgnEccRdChk
knob.description: Enable\Disable PMem ECC Read Check
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/PMem ECC Read Check

knob.name: FastGoConfig
knob.description: Select PMem FastGo Configuration Profiles
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AepOnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/PMem FastGo Configuration

knob.name: NvmQos
knob.description: Prevents DDR4 BW drop in presence of concurrent DDRT BW
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AepOnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/PMem QoS

option.text: Profile 1 - Optimized for 8 PMem modules per socket
Profile 2 - Optimized for 4/2/1 PMem modules per socket

knob.name: LatchSystemShutdownState
knob.description: Latch System Shutdown State
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/PMem Latch System Shutdown State

knob.name: EliminateDirectoryInFarMemory
knob.description: enables new 2LM specific feature to avoid directory updates to far-memory from non-NUMA optimized workloads
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( NumCpus _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Snoopy mode for 2LM

knob.name: NvmdimmPerfConfig
knob.description: PMem baseline performance settings depending on the workload behavior
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AepOnSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/PMem Performance Setting

knob.name: NvmdimmPowerCyclePolicy
knob.prompt: Power Cycle on PMem Surprise Clock Stop
knob.description: Enable/Disable power cycle policy when PMem receive surprise clock stop
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Power Cycle on PMem Surprise Clock Stop

knob.name: DisableDirForAppDirect
knob.description: enables new AD specific feature to avoid directory updates to PMem memory from non-NUMA optimized workloads
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Snoopy mode for AD

knob.name: AppDirectMemoryHole
knob.description: Enable/Disable the App Direct Memory Hole
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/App Direct Memory Hole

knob.name: LsxImplementation
knob.description: Select LSI/LSR/LSW ACPI method implementation
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/LSx implementation

knob.name: ExtendedType17
knob.description: Use extended Type 17 SMBIOS Structures
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Extended Type 17 Structure

knob.name: NvdimmSmbusMaxAccessTime

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/SMBus Max Access Time

knob.name: NvdimmSmbusReleaseDelay

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/SMBus Release Delay

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/NVDIMM Mailbox in NFIT

knob.name: EnableTwoWayNmCache
knob.description: Enable or disable biased 2-way near memory cache support
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR volMemMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Biased 2-way Near Memory Cache Support/Enable biased 2-way near memory cache

knob.name: NonPreferredWayMask
knob.description: 10-bit mask used to control the bias counter ratio: Bit 0 applies to 1st miss Bit 1 applies to 2nd miss ... Bit 9 applies to 10th miss and it repeats (Bit 0 applies to 11th miss and so on) If bit X of this mask is: 0 - (n*10+X+1)th miss should be allocated in preferred way 1 ? (n*10+X+1)th miss should be allocated in non-preferred way
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR volMemMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( EnableTwoWayNmCache _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Biased 2-way Near Memory Cache Support/Non-preferred way mask

knob.name: PreferredReadFirst
knob.description: Select whether reads are issued to the preferred or non-preferred way first
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR volMemMode _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( EnableTwoWayNmCache _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/PMem Configuration/Biased 2-way Near Memory Cache Support/Preferred read first

knob.name: EnableBiosSsaLoader
knob.description: Enables loading the BSSA test module
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SsaLoaderKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/BSSA Module Loader

knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/BSSA Rank Margin Tool

knob.name: RmtOnAdvancedTraining_inst_2
knob.description: Execute RMT after advanced Memory Training, as per memory policy
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/Rmt on Advanced Memtest

knob.name: EnableBiosSsaRMTonFCB

knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/BSSA RMT on Fast Cold Boot

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/Per Bit Margining

knob.name: BiosSsaDisplayTables

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/Display Tables

knob.name: BiosSsaPerDisplayPlots

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/Display Plots

knob.name: BiosSsaLoopCount

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/Loop Count

knob.name: BiosSsaBacksideMargining

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/Backside Margining

knob.name: BiosSsaEarlyReadIdMargining

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/Early Read ID Margining

knob.name: BiosSsaRxDqs
knob.description: Step size of RxDqs. Auto: 1. Supported values: 1,2,4,8
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )

knob.name: BiosSsaRxVref
knob.description: Step size of RxVref. Auto: 1. Supported values: 1,2,4,8
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/RxVref

knob.name: BiosSsaTxDq
knob.description: Step size of TxDq. Auto: 1. Supported values: 1,2,4,8
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/TxDq

knob.name: BiosSsaTxVref
knob.description: Step size of TxVref. Auto: 1. Supported values: 1,2,4,8
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/TxVref

knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/CmdAll

knob.name: BiosSsaCmdVref
knob.description: Step size of CmdVref. Auto: 1. Supported values: 1,2,4,8
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/CmdVref

knob.name: BiosSsaCtlAll
knob.description: Step size of CtlAll. Auto: 1. Supported values: 1,2,4,8
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/CtlAll

knob.name: BiosSsaEridDelay
knob.description: Step size of EridDelay. Auto: 1. Supported values: 1,2,4,8
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/EridDelay

knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BiosSsaStepSizeOverride _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/EridVref

knob.name: BiosSsaDebugMessages
knob.description: Enables the BSSA RMT debug messages
knob.depex: Sif( SsaBuiltInRmtKnobVisible _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ EnableBiosSsaRMT _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/BSSA Configuration Menu/RMT Debug Messages

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries
knob.description: Select how many Ranks will be tested by AdvMemTest. Maximum of 8 Ranks are allowed. Default value of 0 will test all present Ranks in the system.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Number of Ranks to Test

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_0
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 0

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_1
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 1

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_2
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 2

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_3
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 3

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_4
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 4

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_5
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 4 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 5

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_6
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 4 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 6

knob.name: AdvMemTestRankList_7
knob.description: Specify the Rank location using this format: Rank number in bits[3:0]; DIMM number in bits[7:4]; Channel number in the MC in bits[11:8]; MC number in bits[15:12]; Socket number in bits [19:16] and bits [20:31] are reserved. For example to test MC 0, CH 1, DIMM 0, RANK 0 on Socket 0, you need to enter a value of 0x100
knob.depex: Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 4 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 5 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _LTE_ 6 ) _AND_ Sif( AdvMemTestRankListNumEntries _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Adv MemTest Rank Selection/Rank location entry 7

knob.name: NsddcEn
knob.description: Enable 48B SDDC ECC from ICX C0 Onwards
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/New SDDC Mode

knob.name: EsddcEn
knob.description: Enable enhanced SDDC
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Enhanced SDDC

knob.name: SaiPolicyGroupWaBiosW
knob.prompt: Enable Pcode WA for SAI PG
knob.description: Enable Pcode Work Around for SAI Policy group for A Step
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Enable Pcode WA for SAI PG

knob.name: MirrorMode
knob.description: Full Mirror Mode will set entire 1LM memory in system to be mirrored, consequently reducing the memory capacity by half. Partial Mirror Mode will enable the required size of memory to be mirrored. If rank sparing is enabled partial mirroring will not take effect. Enabling any type of Mirror Mode will disable XPT Prefetch.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PartialMirrorUefi _EQU_ 1 OR ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Mirror Mode

knob.name: partialmirrorsize_0
knob.description: Select multiplier of 1 GB for the size of the SAD to be created
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 ) _AND_ Sif( MirrorMode _NEQ_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Partial Mirror 1 Size (GB)

knob.name: partialmirrorsize_1
knob.description: Select multiplier of 1 GB for the size of the SAD to be created
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 ) _AND_ Sif( MirrorMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( partialmirrorsize_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Partial Mirror 2 Size (GB)

knob.name: partialmirrorsize_2
knob.description: Select multiplier of 1 GB for the size of the SAD to be created
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 ) _AND_ Sif( MirrorMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( partialmirrorsize_1 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Partial Mirror 3 Size (GB)

knob.name: partialmirrorsize_3
knob.description: Select multiplier of 1 GB for the size of the SAD to be created
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 ) _AND_ Sif( MirrorMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( partialmirrorsize_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Partial Mirror 4 Size (GB)

knob.name: partialmirrorsad0
knob.description: Enable Mirror on entire memory for TAD0
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 ) _AND_ Gif( MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 OR ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Mirror TAD0

knob.name: PartialMirrorUefi
knob.description: Imitate behavior of UEFI based Address Range Mirror with setup option
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 ) _AND_ Gif( MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 OR ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/UEFI ARM Mirror

knob.name: PartialMirrorUefiPercent
knob.description: Enter the percentage to be mirrored in basis points. 12.75% is represented 1275
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 ) _AND_ Sif( PartialMirrorUefi _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/ARM Mirror percentage

knob.name: RankSparing
knob.description: Enable/Disable Memory Rank Sparing. This feature is only available on 1LM
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Gif( _LIST_ MirrorMode _EQU_ 1 3 OR PartialMirrorUefi _EQU_ 1 OR AepOnSystem _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Memory Rank Sparing

knob.name: Nvar2_multiSparingRanks
knob.description: Set Multi Rank Sparing number, default and the maximum is 2 ranks per channel
knob.depex: Sif( RankSparing _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Multi Rank Sparing

knob.name: MemCeFloodPolicy
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Memory Correctable Error Flood Policy

knob.name: spareErrTh
knob.description: Correctable Error Threshold (1 - 32767) used for sparing and leaky bucket
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Correctable Error Threshold

knob.name: TriggerSWErrThEn
knob.description: Enable or Disable Sparing trigger SW Error Match Threshold
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Trigger SW Error Threshold

knob.name: SpareSwErrTh
knob.description: SW Correctable Error Threshold (1 - 32767) used for bank level information
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Sparing SW Error Match Threshold

knob.name: timeWindow
knob.description: Correctable Error time window based interface in Hour (0 - 24) and shown in Hex
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Correctable Error Time Window

knob.name: leakyBktTimeWindow
knob.prompt: Leaky bucket time window based interface
knob.description: Enable/Disable leaky bucket time window based interface
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Leaky bucket time window based interface

knob.name: leakyBktLo
knob.description: Leaky bucket low bit? (1 - 63)
knob.depex: Sif( leakyBktTimeWindow _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Leaky bucket low bit

knob.name: leakyBktHi
knob.description: Leaky bucket high bit? (1 - 63)
knob.depex: Sif( leakyBktTimeWindow _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Leaky bucket high bit

knob.name: leakyBktHour
knob.prompt: Leaky bucket time window based interface Hour
knob.description: Leaky bucket time window based interface Hour? (0 - 24)
knob.depex: Sif( leakyBktTimeWindow _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Leaky bucket time window based interface Hour

knob.name: leakyBktMinute
knob.prompt: Leaky bucket time window based interface Minute
knob.description: Leaky bucket time window based interface Minute? (0 - 60)
knob.depex: Sif( leakyBktTimeWindow _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Leaky bucket time window based interface Minute

knob.name: PclsEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCLS Sparing
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Gif( CpuType _EQU_ 6 AND HbmSku _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Partial Cache Line Sparing PCLS

knob.name: ADDDCEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable ADDDC Sparing
knob.depex: Gif( RankSparing _EQU_ 1 OR ( CpuType _EQU_ 4 AND EnableSgx _EQU_ 1 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/ADDDC Sparing

knob.name: PlusOneEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Plus One
knob.depex: Gif( RankSparing _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ SystemRasType _EQU_ 0 4 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Plus One

knob.name: PlusOneEn_inst_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable SDDC
knob.depex: Gif( RankSparing _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ( _LIST_ SystemRasType _NEQ_ 0 4 3 ) OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/SDDC

knob.name: AdddcErrInjEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable ADDDC error injection. This requires to force the interleave granularity to 64B for B/L step parts
knob.depex: Sif( ADDDCEn _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Enable ADDDC Error Injection

knob.name: ColumnCorrectionDisable
knob.description: Disable - Turns ON Column Correction feature. Enable - Turns OFF Column Correction feature
knob.depex: Gif( ADDDCEn _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Column Correction Disable

knob.name: DieSparing
knob.description: Enable/Disable PMem Die Sparing
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Set PMem Die Sparing

knob.name: DcpmmEccModeSwitch
knob.description: Enable Far Memory controller switch from Mode A to Mode B
knob.depex: Sif( DcpmmEnable _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/ECC Mode Switch

knob.name: PatrolScrub
knob.description: Enable/Disable Patrol Scrub
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Patrol Scrub

knob.name: PatrolScrubDuration
knob.description: Selects the number of hours (1-24) required to complete full scrub. A value of zero means auto!
knob.depex: Sif( PatrolScrub _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Patrol Scrub Interval

knob.name: PatrolScrubAddrMode
knob.description: Selects the address mode between System Physical Address (or) Reverse Address
knob.depex: Sif( PatrolScrub _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Memory Configuration/Memory RAS Configuration/Patrol Scrub Address Mode

knob.name: ProcessorHyperThreadingDisable
knob.description: Enables Hyper Threading (Software Method to Enable/Disable Logical Processor threads.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Hyper-Threading [ALL]

knob.name: IedTraceSize
knob.description: Option to allocate memory for PSMI trace
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/IED Trace memory

knob.name: AllowMixedPowerOnCpuRatio
knob.description: Skip Flex Ratio overrides to use power-on default Flex Ratio values. In multi-socket systems, this will allow mixed flex ratio limits.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Skip Flex Ratio Override

knob.name: CheckCpuBist
knob.description: Disable failed BIST core when enabled, otherwise, ignore BIST result
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Check CPU BIST Result

knob.name: CoreFailover
knob.description: Enable spare core(s) in place of core(s) that fail BIST
knob.depex: Sif( ( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 6 ) AND ( CheckCpuBist _EQU_ 1 ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Core Failover

knob.name: ThreeStrikeTimer
knob.description: The 3 strike counter can be turned off by writing into the MISC_FEATURE_CONTROL_DISABLE_THREE_STRIKE_CNT(MSR 0x01a4).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/3StrikeTimer

knob.name: FastStringEnable
knob.description: When enabled, enable fast strings for REP MOVS/STOS
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Fast String

knob.name: MachineCheckEnable
knob.description: Enable or Disable the Machine Check
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Machine Check

knob.name: CpuidMaxValue
knob.description: This should be enabled in order to boot legacy OSes that cannot support CPUs with extended CPUID functions.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Max CPUID Value Limit

knob.name: CpuMtoIWa
knob.description: AUTO: M2I ON, Scrubbing ON Option 1: M2I OFF, Scrubbing ON Option 2: M2I ON, Scrubbing OFF
knob.depex: Sif( DcuRtlWaEn _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/MtoI Workaround

knob.name: MlcStreamerPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: - MLC Streamer Prefetcher (MSR 1A4h Bit[0])
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Hardware Prefetcher

knob.name: L2RfoPrefetchDisable
knob.description: - L2 RFO Prefetch (MSR 972h Bit[3])
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/L2 RFO Prefetch Disable

knob.name: MlcSpatialPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: - MLC Spatial Prefetcher (MSR 1A4h Bit[1])
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Adjacent Cache Prefetch

knob.name: DCUStreamerPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: DCU streamer prefetcher is an L1 data cache prefetcher (MSR 1A4h [2]).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/DCU Streamer Prefetcher

knob.name: DCUIPPrefetcherEnable
knob.description: DCU IP prefetcher is an L1 data cache prefetcher (MSR 1A4h [3]).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/DCU IP Prefetcher

knob.name: LlcPrefetchEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable LLC Prefetch on all threads
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/LLC Prefetch

knob.name: DCUModeSelection
knob.description: Normal: The whole DCU used for caching; Mirror-Mode: DCU organized as 2x16KB mirrored copies
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/DCU Mode

knob.name: CpuL1NextPagePrefetcherDisable
knob.description: Next page prefetcher is an L1 data cache page prefetcher (MSR 1A4h [4]).
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/L1 Next Page Prefetcher

knob.name: AmpPrefetchEnable
knob.description: Set to enable or disable MLC AMP prefetch (MSR 1A4h [4]).
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/AMP Prefetch

knob.name: BspSelection
knob.description: Choose the method to select BSP
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Bsp Selection

knob.name: ProcessorX2apic
knob.description: Enable/disable extended APIC support Note: This will enable VT-d automatically if x2APIC is enabled
knob.depex: Gif( X2ApicForceEn _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Extended APIC

knob.name: ForcePhysicalModeEnable
knob.description: Enalbe/Disable the APIC physical destination mode
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/APIC Physical Mode

knob.name: PCIeDownStreamPECIWrite
knob.description: Enable PCIe Down Stream PECI Write
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _NEQ_ 0 1 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Down Stream PECI

knob.name: PeciInTrustControlBit
knob.description: PECI in trust bit enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/PECI

knob.name: PeciAgtLegacyTrustBit
knob.description: Legacy PECI agent in trust bit enable
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _EQU_ 0 1 2 ) _AND_ Gif( PeciInTrustControlBit _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/ Legacy Agent

knob.name: PeciAgtSmbusTrustBit
knob.description: SMBus PECI agent in trust bit enable
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _EQU_ 0 1 2 ) _AND_ Gif( PeciInTrustControlBit _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/ SMBus Agent

knob.name: PeciAgtIeTrustBit
knob.description: IE PECI agent in trust bit enable
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _EQU_ 0 1 2 ) _AND_ Gif( PeciInTrustControlBit _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/ IE Agent

knob.name: PeciAgtGenericTrustBit
knob.description: Generic PECI agent in trust bit enable
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _EQU_ 0 1 2 ) _AND_ Gif( PeciInTrustControlBit _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/ Generic Agent

knob.name: PeciAgtEspiTrustBit
knob.description: ESPI PECI agent in trust bit enable
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _EQU_ 0 1 2 ) _AND_ Gif( PeciInTrustControlBit _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/ eSPI Agent

knob.name: CpuDbpEnable
knob.description: The DBP-F can be turned off by writing into the (MSR 792h [5:6] for CLX, CPX, and MSR 6Dh [2:3] for ICX).
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/DBP-F

knob.name: IioLlcWaysMask
knob.description: MSR CBO_SLICE0_CR_IIO_LLC_WAYS bitmask
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/IIO LLC Ways [19:0](Hex)

knob.name: RemoteWaysMask
knob.description: MSR INGRESS_SPARE bitmask[26:16], Value 0 means no override
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Remote Ways [22:12](Hex)

knob.name: SmmBlockedDelayed
knob.description: Enable/Disable SMM Blocked and Delayed
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SMM Blocked and Delayed

knob.name: eSmmSaveState
knob.description: Enable or Disable the eSMM Save State Feature
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/eSMM Save State

knob.name: SmbusErrorRecovery
knob.description: Enable or Disable Smbus Error Recovery
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Smbus Error Recovery

knob.name: ProcessorLtsxEnable
knob.description: Enables Intel(R) TXT.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Enable Intel(R) TXT

knob.name: ProcessorVmxEnable
knob.description: Enables the Vanderpool Technology, takes effect after reboot.
knob.depex: Gif( ProcessorLtsxEnable _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/VMX

knob.name: ProcessorSmxEnable
knob.description: Enables Safer Mode Extensions.
knob.depex: Gif( ProcessorLtsxEnable _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Enable SMX

knob.name: LockChipset
knob.description: Lock or Unlock chipset
knob.depex: Gif( ProcessorLtsxEnable _EQU_ 0x01 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Lock Chipset

knob.name: BiosAcmErrorReset
knob.description: When BIOS ACM error occurs, If enabled, it will disable TXT and Reset system (Restart system in non-TXT mode). If disabled, it will Ignore errors, and continue booting with no further BIOSACM being called
knob.depex: Sif( AcmType _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/BIOS ACM Error Reset

knob.name: ProcessorMsrLockControl
knob.description: Enable - MSR 3Ah and CSR 80h will be locked. Power Good reset is needed to remove lock bits.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/MSR Lock Control

knob.name: ProcessorMsrPkgCstConfigControlLock
knob.prompt: PKG CST CONFIG CONTROL MSR Lock
knob.description: Enable - MSR E2h will be locked. Power Good reset is needed to remove lock bits.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/PKG CST CONFIG CONTROL MSR Lock

knob.name: PpinControl
knob.description: Unlock and Enable/Disable PPIN Control
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/PPIN Control

knob.name: AesEnable
knob.description: Enable/disable AES-NI support
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/AES-NI

knob.name: TscResetEnable
knob.description: Enable or Disable TSC reset during warm reboot
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/TSC Reset

knob.name: AcExceptionOnSplitLockEnable
knob.description: Enable or Disable #AC (Alignment Check) Exception On Split Lock
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/#AC Exception On Split Lock

knob.name: EnableTme
knob.description: Enable/Disable Total Memory Encryption (TME)
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( TmeCapability _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Total Memory Encryption (TME)

knob.name: EnableMktme
knob.description: Enable/Disable Total Memory Encryption - Multi-Tenant (TME-MT). Can be enabled only if Socket Configuration -? Processor Configuration -? Limit CPU PA to 46 bits - Disable
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( TmeCapability _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( CpuPaLimit _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableTme _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( MktmeCapability _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Total Memory Encryption Multi-Tenant(TME-MT)

knob.name: SgxFactoryReset
knob.description: Perform SGX Factory Reset, on subseqent boot: delete all registration data, if SGX enabled will force Initial Platform Establishment flow.
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR ( UmaBasedClustering _NEQ_ 0 AND ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGX Factory Reset

knob.name: EnableSgx
knob.description: Enable/Disable Software Guard Extensions (SGX)
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR ( UmaBasedClustering _NEQ_ 0 AND ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 ) ) ) _AND_ Gif( CpuType _EQU_ 4 AND ADDDCEn _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SW Guard Extensions (SGX)

knob.name: SgxPackageInfoInBandAccess
knob.description: Enable/Disable Software Guard Extensions (SGX) Package Info In-Band Access
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR ( UmaBasedClustering _NEQ_ 0 AND ( CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGX Package Info In-Band Access

knob.name: PrmrrSize
knob.description: Setting the PRMRR Size
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/PRMRR Size

knob.name: SgxQoS
knob.description: Enable/Disable SGX Quality of Service
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGX QoS

knob.name: EpochUpdate
knob.description: There are two Owner EPOCH modes (Each EPOCH is 64bit): change to new random owner epoch and manually entered by user. After generating new epoch via ?Change to New Random Owner EPOCHs?, the selection reverts back to ?Manual User Defined Owner EPOCHs?
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Select Owner EPOCH input type

option.text: Change to New Random Owner EPOCHs

knob.name: SgxEpoch0
knob.description: Software Guard Extensions Epoch 0
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ShowEpoch _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Software Guard Extensions Epoch 0

knob.name: SgxEpoch1
knob.description: Software Guard Extensions Epoch 1
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( ShowEpoch _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Software Guard Extensions Epoch 1

knob.name: SgxLeWr
knob.description: Enable writes to SGXLEPUBKEYHASH[3..0] from OS/SW
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SgxDebugMode _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGXLEPUBKEYHASHx Write Enable

knob.name: SgxLePubKeyHash0
knob.description: SGX Launch Enclave Public Key Hash byte 7-0
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SgxDebugMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SgxLeWr _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGXLEPUBKEYHASH0

knob.name: SgxLePubKeyHash1
knob.description: SGX Launch Enclave Public Key Hash byte 15-8
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SgxDebugMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SgxLeWr _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGXLEPUBKEYHASH1

knob.name: SgxLePubKeyHash2
knob.description: SGX Launch Enclave Public Key Hash byte 23-16
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SgxDebugMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SgxLeWr _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGXLEPUBKEYHASH2

knob.name: SgxLePubKeyHash3
knob.description: SGX Launch Enclave Public Key Hash byte 31-24
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( SgxDebugMode _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( SgxLeWr _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/SGXLEPUBKEYHASH3

knob.name: SgxAutoRegistrationAgent
knob.prompt: Enable/Disable SGX Auto MP Registration Agent
knob.description: The MP registration agent is responsible for register the platform
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IsSgxCapable _EQU_ 0 OR EnableTme _EQU_ 0 OR NumaEn _EQU_ 0 OR MirrorMode _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSgx _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( IsHwCongifSupportedBySgx _EQU_ 0 OR EnableSaf _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Enable/Disable SGX Auto MP Registration Agent

knob.name: CpuPaLimit
knob.description: Limit CPU physical address to 46 bits to support older Hyper-v. If enabled, automatically disables TME-MT.
knob.depex: Sif( _LIST_ CpuType _NEQ_ 4 5 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Limit CPU PA to 46 bits

knob.name: RdtCatOpportunisticTuning
knob.description: Cache Allocation Technology mask tuning options. NOTE: If IOT is enabled on any socket this option will override to 0x003
knob.depex: Sif( IotEn_0 _EQU_ 1 OR IotEn_1 _EQU_ 1 OR IotEn_2 _EQU_ 1 OR IotEn_3 _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/RDT CAT Opportunistic Tuning

knob.name: CoreDisableMask_0
knob.description: 0: Enable all cores. FFFFFFFFFFF: Disable all cores
knob.depex: Sif( IssMaxLevel _NEQ_ 0 AND IssTdpLevel _NEQ_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Per-Socket Configuration/CPU Socket 0 Configuration/Disable Bitmap

knob.name: IotEn_0
knob.description: Each bit enables IOT/OCLA for a CBo. Note: IOT Enable will override RDT CAT opportunistic tuning
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Per-Socket Configuration/CPU Socket 0 Configuration/IOT Cfg

knob.name: OclaMinWay_0
knob.description: Number of LLC Ways for IOT OCLA
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IotEn_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Per-Socket Configuration/CPU Socket 0 Configuration/ Num of OCLA ways

knob.name: OclaMaxTorEntry_0
knob.description: Valid from 0 to 17 (11 hex)
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) ) _AND_ Sif( IotEn_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Processor Configuration/Per-Socket Configuration/CPU Socket 0 Configuration/ OCLA Tor IDs

knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/ACPI Sx State Control/ACPI S4

knob.name: ProcessorHWPMEnable
knob.description: Disable: Hardware chooses a P-state based on OS Request (Legacy P-States) Native Mode:Hardware chooses a P-state based on OS guidance Out of Band Mode:Hardware autonomously chooses a P-state (no OS guidance)
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Hardware PM State Control/Hardware P-States

option.text: Native Mode with No Legacy Support

knob.name: ProcessorHWPMInterrupt
knob.description: Enable/Disable Hardware PM Interrupt
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Hardware PM State Control/HardwarePM Interrupt

knob.name: ProcessorEPPEnable
knob.description: When disabled, HW masks EPP in CPUID[6].10 and uses EPB for EPP
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Hardware PM State Control/EPP Enable

knob.name: ProcessorEppProfile
knob.description: Choose an HWPM Profile (EPP)
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 ) _AND_ Sif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _NEQ_ 2 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorEPPEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Hardware PM State Control/EPP profile

knob.name: ProcessorAPSrocketing
knob.description: Enable/Disable the rocketing mechanism in the HWP p-state selection pcode algorithm. Rocketing enables the core ratio to jump to max turbo instantaneously as opposed to a smooth ramp up
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Hardware PM State Control/APS rocketing

knob.name: ProcessorScalability
knob.description: Enable/Disable Core Performance to Frequency Scalability Based Optimizations in the CPU
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Hardware PM State Control/Scalability

knob.name: NativeAspmEnable
knob.description: Enabled - OS Controlled ASPM, Disabled - ASPM Off, AUTO - BIOS Controlled ASPM
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Hardware PM State Control/Native ASPM

knob.name: ProcessorRaplPrioritization
knob.description: This knob controls whether RAPL balancer is enabled. When enabled it activates per core power budgeting.
knob.depex: Gif( SstCpCapableSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Frequency Prioritization/RAPL Prioritization

knob.name: AvxLicensePreGrant
knob.description: Enables AVX ICCP pre-grant level override.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/AVX Licence Pre-Grant Override

knob.name: AvxIccpLevel
knob.description: Pre-grants an AVX level to the core. Base frequency is not updated
knob.depex: Sif( AvxLicensePreGrant _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/AVX ICCP pre-grant level

knob.name: ProcessorEistEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable EIST (P-States)
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/SpeedStep (Pstates)

knob.name: ConfigTdpLock
knob.description: Config TDP CONTROL Lock Bit
knob.depex: Sif( IssMaxLevel _NEQ_ 0 OR ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Config TDP Lock

knob.name: ConfigTdpLevel
knob.description: AVX P1 level selection
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/AVX P1

knob.name: DynamicIss
knob.description: Support Dynamic SST-PP Select. NOTE: Disable: Static SST-PP can be displayed.
knob.depex: Sif( IssMaxLevel _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Dynamic SST-PP

knob.name: IssTdpLevel
knob.description: Intel SST-PP Select allows user to choose from up to two additional base frequency conditions.
knob.depex: Sif( IssMaxLevel _EQU_ 0 OR ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR DynamicIss _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Intel SST-PP

knob.name: ProcessorActivePbf
knob.description: This Option allows SST-BF to be enabled.
knob.depex: Sif( PbfCapableSystem _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Activate SST-BF

knob.name: ProcessorConfigurePbf
knob.description: This Option allows BIOS to configure SST-BF High Priority Cores so that SW does not have to configure.
knob.depex: Sif( PbfCapableSystem _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorActivePbf _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Configure SST-BF

knob.name: ProcessorEistPsdFunc
knob.description: Choose HW_ALL/SW_ALL in _PSD return
knob.depex: Gif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0x00 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/EIST PSD Function

knob.name: BootPState
knob.description: Select the performance state that the BIOS will set before OS hand off.
knob.depex: Gif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Boot performance mode

knob.name: EETurboDisable
knob.description: Energy Efficient Turbo Disable, MSR 0x1FC [19]
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Energy Efficient Turbo

knob.name: TurboMode
knob.description: Enable/Disable processor Turbo Mode (requires EMTTM enabled too).
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Turbo Mode

knob.name: ProcessorFlexibleRatioOverrideEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable CPU Flex Ratio Programming
knob.depex: Sif( AllowMixedPowerOnCpuRatio _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/CPU Flex Ratio Override

knob.name: ProcessorFlexibleRatio
knob.description: Non-Turbo Mode Processor Core Ratio Multiplier
knob.depex: Sif( AllowMixedPowerOnCpuRatio _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( ProcessorFlexibleRatioOverrideEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/CPU Core Flex Ratio

knob.name: GpssTimer
knob.description: P-state change hysteresis time window
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/GPSS timer

knob.name: EnableXe
knob.description: Enable/Disable Extreme Edition support.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Overclocking/ Extreme Edition

knob.name: OverclockingLock
knob.description: Enable/Disable Overclocking.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( HideOverclockingLock _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Overclocking/ Overclocking Lock

knob.name: AvxSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable AVX/2/3 instructions. Applicable to only certain SKUs - OC and HEDT
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 OR OcCap _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Overclocking/ AVX Support

knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableXe _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Overclocking/TurboRatioLimit0

knob.description: Allows Monitor and MWAIT instructions.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU C State Control/Enable Monitor MWAIT

knob.name: C1AutoDemotion
knob.description: Allows CPU to automatically demote to C1. Takes effect after reboot.
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU C State Control/CPU C1 auto demotion

knob.name: C1AutoUnDemotion
knob.description: Allows CPU to automatically undemote from C1. Takes effect after reboot.
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU C State Control/CPU C1 auto undemotion

knob.name: C6Enable
knob.description: Enable/Disable CPU C6(ACPI C3) report to OS
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU C State Control/CPU C6 report

knob.name: ProcessorC1eEnable
knob.description: Core C1E auto promotion Control. Takes effect after reboot.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU C State Control/Enhanced Halt State (C1E)

knob.name: OSCx
knob.description: Report CC3/CC6 to OS ACPI C2 or ACPI C3
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU C State Control/ OS ACPI Cx

knob.name: PackageCState
knob.description: Package C State limit
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Package C State

knob.name: EnableLowerLatencyMode
knob.description: Enable lower latency mode for register accesses. Note: Enabling this mode will prevent PkgC6 as register access fabric is prevented from going into idle.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Register Access Low Latency Mode

knob.name: C2C3TT
knob.description: Default - 0, means [AUTO]. C2 to C3 Transition Timer, PPDN_INIT - 1:10:1:74 Bit[11:0].
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/C2C3TT

knob.name: DynamicL1
knob.description: PCU_MISC_CONFIG Bit[21] - dynamic L1 enable
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Dynamic L1

knob.name: PkgCLatNeg
knob.description: MSR 1FCh Bit[30] - PCH_NEG_DISABLE
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKG C-state Lat. Neg.

knob.name: LTRSwInput
knob.description: MSR 1FCh Bit[29] - LTR_IIO_DISABLE. Disable - Ignore IIO LTR input.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/LTR IIO Input

knob.name: EnablePkgcCriteria
knob.description: Program WRITE_PKGC_SA_PS_CRITERIA Sub Menu
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Enable PKGC_SA_PS_CRITERIA

knob.name: mdllSden
knob.description: Enable to shut down MDLL during SR
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/MDLL Off

knob.name: CStateLatencyCtrlValid_0
knob.description: This field qualifies the validity of the Value field in this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ VALID:

knob.name: CStateLatencyCtrlMultiplier_0
knob.description: This field indicates the unit of measurement that is defined for the Value field in this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CStateLatencyCtrlValid_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ MULTIPLIER:

knob.name: CStateLatencyCtrlValue_0
knob.description: The Interrupt Response Time Limit is given in units defined in the Multiplier field of this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CStateLatencyCtrlValid_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ VALUE:

knob.description: This field qualifies the validity of the Value field in this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ VALID:

knob.description: This field indicates the unit of measurement that is defined for the Value field in this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CStateLatencyCtrlValid_1 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ MULTIPLIER:

knob.name: CStateLatencyCtrlValue_1
knob.description: The Interrupt Response Time Limit is given in units defined in the Multiplier field of this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CStateLatencyCtrlValid_1 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ VALUE:

knob.name: CStateLatencyCtrlValid_2
knob.description: This field qualifies the validity of the Value field in this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ VALID:
