knob.description: This field indicates the unit of measurement that is defined for the Value field in this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CStateLatencyCtrlValid_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ MULTIPLIER:

knob.name: CStateLatencyCtrlValue_2
knob.description: The Interrupt Response Time Limit is given in units defined in the Multiplier field of this register.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( CStateLatencyCtrlValid_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/PKGc Interrupt Response Time/ VALUE:

knob.name: TStateEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable Software Controlled T-States
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/CPU T State Control/Software Controlled T-States

knob.name: OnDieThermalThrottling
knob.description: On-Die Thermal Throttling
knob.depex: Sif( TStateEnable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/CPU T State Control/T-State Throttle Level

knob.name: EnableProcHot
knob.description: When a processor thermal sensor trips (either core), the PROCHOT# will be driven. If bi-direction is enabled, external agents can drive PROCHOT# to throttle the processor.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU Thermal Management/PROCHOT Modes

knob.name: EnableThermalMonitor
knob.description: Enable/Disable Thermal Monitor
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU Thermal Management/Thermal Monitor

knob.name: ThermalMonitorStatusFilter
knob.description: Enable Filter based therm_monitor_status(IA32_THERM_STATUS[0]) reporting
knob.depex: Sif( ( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 6 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) OR EnableThermalMonitor _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU Thermal Management/Therm-Monitor-Status Filter

knob.name: ThermalMonitorStatusFilterTimeWindow
knob.description: Time window(Seconds) for the filter.
knob.depex: Sif( ( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 6 OR CpuType _EQU_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) OR EnableThermalMonitor _EQU_ 0 OR ThermalMonitorStatusFilter _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU Thermal Management/Therm-Monitor-Status Filter Time Window

knob.name: ProchotResponseRatio
knob.description: Controls the CPU response to an inbound platform assertion of xxPROCHOT# by capping to the programmed ratio. Default value 0 will allow ME to control this value. If ME does not set ratio, default 0 equates to Pn. A non-zero value will override ME setting. The min allowed ratio is defined by PLATFORM_INFO[MIN_OPERATING_RATIO]
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU Thermal Management/PROCHOT RATIO

knob.name: TCCActivationOffset
knob.description: Offset from factory set TCC activation temperature at which the Thermal Control Circuit must be activated.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU Thermal Management/TCC Activation Offset

knob.name: UncoreFreqScaling
knob.description: If disable, user can input Uncore Frequency.
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Uncore Freq Scaling

knob.name: InputUncoreFreq
knob.description: User input Uncore Frequency override MSR 0x620 MinClrRatio[14:8] n MaxClrRatio[6:0] If input value ? MAX_CLM_RATIO, then override with MAX_CLM_RATIO If input value ? MIN_CLM_RATIO, then override with MIN_CLM_RATIO
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) ) _AND_ Sif( UncoreFreqScaling _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/ Uncore Freq:

knob.name: UncoreFreqRaplLimit
knob.description: Enable: BYPASS_CLM_RAPL_LIMIT - 0 Disable: BYPASS_CLM_RAPL_LIMIT - 1
knob.depex: Sif( ( CpuType _NEQ_ 4 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Uncore Freq RAPL

knob.name: SAPMControl
knob.description: MSR 1FCh Bit[22] - PWR_PERF_TUNING_DISABLE_SAPM_CTRL
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/SAPM Control

knob.name: EetOverrideEn
knob.description: Coarse Grained Mode decides whether to grant user request turbo or P1. Fine Grained Mode decides how much turbo to be granted. More helpful with Scalability Enabled
knob.depex: Gif( EETurboDisable _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/EET Mode

knob.name: PwrPerfTuning
knob.description: Options decides who Controls EPB. In OS mode: IA32_ENERGY_PERF_BIAS is used In BIOS mode: ENERGY_PERF_BIAS_CONFIG is used In PECI mode: PCS53 is used
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/Power Performance Tuning

knob.name: ProcessorOutofBandAlternateEPB
knob.description: Controls whether PECI has control over EPB
knob.depex: Gif( PwrPerfTuning _EQU_ 1 OR ProcessorHWPMEnable _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/PECI PCS EPB

knob.name: AltEngPerfBIAS
knob.description: Use input from ENERGY_PERF_BIAS_CONFIG mode selection. PERF/Balanced Perf/Balanced Power/Power
knob.depex: Gif( PwrPerfTuning _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/ENERGY_PERF_BIAS_CFG mode

knob.name: PwrPerfSwitch
knob.description: Dynamic Loadline Switch control. MSR 0x1FC[Bit24]
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/Dynamic Loadline Switch

knob.name: WorkLdConfig
knob.description: This allows optimization for the workload characterization. The three options for selection
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/Workload Configuration

knob.name: EngAvgTimeWdw1
knob.description: This is used to control the effective window of the average for C0 an P0 time
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/Averaging Time Window

knob.name: P0TtlTimeLow1
knob.description: The HW switching mechanism DISABLES the performance setting (0) when the total P0 time is less than this threshold
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/P0 TotalTimeThreshold Low

knob.name: P0TtlTimeHigh1
knob.description: The HW switching mechanism ENABLES the performance setting (0) when the total P0 time is greater than this threshold
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU - Advanced PM Tuning/Energy Perf BIAS/P0 TotalTimeThreshold High

knob.name: CurrentConfig
knob.description: 0 - Default, do nothing; 1 - Manual, override Current limitation in 1/8 A increments.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package Current Config/Current Limit Override

knob.name: CurrentLimit
knob.description: Current limitation in 1/8 A increments. This field is locked by VR_CURRENT_CONFIG[LOCK] Value ?- CURRENT_LIMIT
knob.depex: Sif( CurrentConfig _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package Current Config/Current Limitation

knob.name: PpcccLock
knob.description: Lock for CURRENT_LIMIT settings Move this into the Config Above
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package Current Config/Lock Indication

knob.name: PkgCstEntryValCtl
knob.description: Allows manual overrides for PKG_CST_ENTRY_CRITERIA_MASK
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/Program Pkg C-state Entry Criteria/PKGC_ENTRY_CRITERIA OVRD

knob.name: SwLtrOvrdCtl
knob.description: Allows manual overrides for PCIE_ILTR_OVRD
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/PCIe LTR Override Control

knob.name: SnpLatVld
knob.description: Snoop Latency override Control
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Snoop Latency Override

knob.name: SnpLatOvrd
knob.description: Control to ignore PCIe LTR, and force the Snoop Latency value
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Force Snoop Latency Override

knob.name: SnpLatMult
knob.description: Override Value is multiplied by this field to yield a time value
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Snoop Latency Multiplier

knob.name: SnpLatVal
knob.description: Control to ignore PCIe LTR, and force the Non-Snoop Latency value
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Force Non-Snoop Latency Override

knob.name: NonSnpLatVld
knob.description: Non-Snoop Latency override Control
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Non-Snoop Latency Override Valid

knob.name: NonSnpLatOvrd
knob.description: Force Pcode to always use values provided in SW_LTR_OVRD
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Non-Snoop Latency Override

knob.name: NonSnpLatMult
knob.description: Override Value is multiplied by this field to yield a time value
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Non-Snoop Latency Multiplier

knob.name: NonSnpLatVal
knob.description: Latency requirement for Non-Snoop requests
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( SwLtrOvrdCtl _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Package C State Control/Latency Tolerance Requirement (LTR)/Non-Snoop Latency Value

knob.name: UncrPerfPlmtOvrdEn
knob.description: Uncore Perf PLimit Override
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/EPB Override Control/UNCORE_PERF_PLIMIT_OVRD_EN

knob.name: IoBwPlmtOvrdEn
knob.description: IO BW PLimit Override
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/EPB Override Control/IO_BW_PLIMIT_OVRD_EN

knob.name: IomApmOvrdEn
knob.description: IOM APM Override
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/EPB Override Control/IOM_APM_OVERRIDE_ENABLE

knob.name: KtiApmOvrdEn
knob.description: UPI APM Override
knob.SetupPgPtr: ???/EPB Override Control/UPI_APM_OVERRIDE_ENABLE

knob.name: PerfPlimitDifferential
knob.description: Parameter used to tune how far below local socket frequency remote socket frequency is allowed to be. Also impacts rate at which frequency drops when feature disengages.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Perf P-Limit/Perf P-Limit Differential

knob.name: PerfPLimitClipC
knob.description: Maximum value the floor is allowed to be set to for perf P-limit.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Perf P-Limit/Perf P-Limit Clip

knob.name: PerfPLmtThshld
knob.description: Uncore frequency threshold above which this socket will trigger the feature and start trying to raise frequency of other sockets.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Perf P-Limit/Perf P-Limit Threshold

knob.name: PerfPLimitEn
knob.description: Enable/Disable Performance P-Limit
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/CPU P State Control/Perf P-Limit/Perf P Limit

knob.name: DramRaplPwrLimitLockCsr
knob.prompt: DRAM RAPL Power Limit Lock CSR
knob.description: This Option allows unlock/lock DRAM_PLANE_POWER_LIMIT.pp_pwr_lim_lock. Enable - Lock Disable - Unlock
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/DRAM RAPL Configuration/DRAM RAPL Power Limit Lock CSR

knob.name: BwLimitTfOvrd
knob.description: Allows custom tuning of BW_LIMIT_TF when DRAM RAPL is enabled
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/DRAM RAPL Configuration/Override BW_LIMIT_TF

knob.name: DramRaplEnable
knob.description: Enable\Disable DRAM Rapl
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/DRAM RAPL Configuration/DRAM RAPL

knob.name: DramRaplExtendedRange
knob.description: Select DRAM RAPL Extended Range
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/DRAM RAPL Configuration/DRAM RAPL Extended Range

knob.name: CmsEnableDramPm
knob.description: CMS ENABLE DRAM PM
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/Memory Power n Thermal Configuration/DRAM RAPL Configuration/CMS ENABLE DRAM PM

knob.name: FastRaplDutyCycle
knob.description: FAST_RAPL_NSTRIKE_PL2_DUTY_CYCLE value between 25 (10%) - 64 (25%)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/FAST_RAPL_NSTRIKE_PL2_DUTY_CYCLE

knob.name: TurboPowerLimitLock
knob.description: Enable/Disable locking of Package RAPL Limit MSR and a reset will be required to unlock the register.
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/Package RAPL Limit MSR Lock

knob.name: TurboPowerLimitCsrLock
knob.description: Enable/Disable locking of Package RAPL Limit CSR and a reset will be required to unlock the register.
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/Package RAPL Limit CSR Lock

knob.name: PowerLimit1En
knob.description: Enable/Disable PL1. If this option is disabled, BIOS will program the default values for PL1 Power Limit and PL1 Time Window.
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/PL1 Limit

knob.name: PowerLimit1Power
knob.description: PL1 Power Limit in Watts. The value may vary from 0 to Fused Value. If the value is 0, the fused value will be programmed. A value greater than fused TDP value will not be programmed.
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR PowerLimit1En _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/PL1 Power Limit

knob.name: PowerLimit1Time
knob.description: PL1 value in seconds. The value may vary from 0 to 448. Indicates the time window over which TDP value should be maintained. If the value is 0, the fused value will be programmed.
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR PowerLimit1En _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/PL1 Time Window

knob.name: PowerLimit2En
knob.description: Enable/Disable PL2. If this option is disabled, BIOS will program the default values for PL2 Power Limit and PL2 Time Window.
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR PowerLimit1En _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/PL2 Limit

knob.name: PowerLimit2Power
knob.description: PL2 Power Limit in Watts. The value may vary from 0 to Fused Value. If the value is 0, BIOS programs 125% * TDP
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR PowerLimit2En _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/PL2 Power Limit

knob.name: PowerLimit2Time
knob.description: PL2 value in seconds. The value may vary from 0 to 448. Indicates the time window over which TDP value should be maintained. If the value is 0, the fused value will be programmed.
knob.depex: Sif( ProcessorEistEnable _EQU_ 0 OR TurboMode _EQU_ 0 OR PowerLimit2En _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/SOCKET RAPL Config/PL2 Time Window

knob.name: PmaxLoadLine
knob.description: Select Platform DC Loadline. NOTE: LL option 1 - 0.5mohm LL option 2 - 0.85mohm
knob.depex: Sif( 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/DC LL Select

knob.name: PmaxDetector
knob.description: Enable/Disable PMAX detector feature. WARNING: Disabling this feature can cause system instability.
knob.depex: Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/Detector

knob.name: EnhancedPmaxDetector
knob.description: PMAX Detector Enhancement attempts to reduce throttling on PMAX event for certain workloads.
knob.depex: Sif( PmaxDetector _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _NEQ_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/PMAX Detector Enhancement

knob.name: PmaxAutoAdjustment
knob.description: Enable BIOS Auto Adjustment.
knob.depex: Sif( PmaxDetector _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 6 OR CpuType _EQU_ 5 OR CpuType _EQU_ 3 OR CpuType _EQU_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/BIOS Auto Adjustment

knob.name: PmaxSign
knob.description: Negative: Detector will trip on higher power consumption. Positive: Detector will trip on lower power consumption.
knob.depex: Sif( PmaxDetector _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/PMAX Config Sign

knob.name: PmaxOffset
knob.description: Input decimal correction factor to program. Valid input values are 0 to 63. Will be positive or negative based on PMAX Config Sign value.
knob.depex: Sif( PmaxDetector _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PmaxSign _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/PMAX Config Positive Offset

knob.name: PmaxOffsetNegative
knob.description: Input decimal correction factor to program. Valid input values are 0 to 63. Will be positive or negative based on PMAX Config Sign value.
knob.depex: Sif( PmaxDetector _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PmaxSign _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/PMAX Config Negative Offset

knob.name: PmaxTriggerSetup
knob.description: Possible selection options [0], [1], [2] [0] - Interaction disabled (default) [1] - Enable external trigger mode [2] - Enable internal trigger observability
knob.depex: Sif( PmaxDetector _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( CpuType _EQU_ 0 OR CpuType _EQU_ 1 OR CpuType _EQU_ 2 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Socket Configuration/Advanced Power Management Configuration/PMax Detector Configuration/Trigger Setup
